original: ngo tsha shes pa ni dge ba'i ngo tsha shes par ro //
analyzed: ngo tsha shes pa ni dge ba'i ngo tsha shes par ro //
translated: Shame is shame with regard to virtue.

original: snying rje ni rnam par mi 'tshe bar ro //
analyzed: snying rje ni rnam par mi 'tshe bar ro //
translated: Compassion is non-violence.

original: brtse ba gsum ni 'dod chags su'o /
analyzed: brtse ba gsum ni 'dod chags su'o /
translated: The three terms “love,” etc., are synonyms for attachment.

original: dogs pa dang the tshom dag ni rtsa ba'i nyon mongs pa drug par ro //
analyzed: dogs pa dang the tshom dag ni rtsa ba'i nyon mongs pa drug par ro //
translated: Fear and doubt are synonyms for the six root afflictions.

original: ser sna ni ser sna'am phrag dog tu'o //
analyzed: ser sna ni ser sna'am phrag dog tu'o //
translated: Avarice is avarice or envy.

original: de'i phyir de rnams ni dge ba dang mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa'i phyir rang bzhin gyis sems las byung ba rnams kho na yin te sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir de rnams ni dge ba dang mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa'i phyir rang bzhin gyis sems las byung ba rnams kho na yin te sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
translated: Therefore, these are only mental factors that are virtuous, non-virtuous, and neutral by nature, as the words are to be taken literally.

original: da ni don dang bcas pa'i ming rnams //
analyzed: da ni don dang bcas pa'i ming rnams //
translated: Now, the names that have meaning🔽are well known as the names of signs

original: kun rdzob gsal ba'i ngo bo dang // mtshan ma'i ming du rab tu grags //
analyzed: kun rdzob gsal ba'i ngo bo dang // mtshan ma'i ming du rab tu grags //
translated: of the essence that illuminates the relative.

original: de bzhin bud med ming du brjod //
analyzed: de bzhin bud med ming du brjod //
translated: Likewise, the term “woman” is expressed.

original: 'jam po'i rnam pa'ang dang de bzhin no ;
analyzed: 'jam po'i rnam pa'ang dang de bzhin no ;
translated: The term “soft” is also like that.🔽The very name “left”

original: / g-yon pa yi ni ming nyid dang // zla ba'i dkyil 'khor padma can //
analyzed: / g-yon pa yi ni ming nyid dang // zla ba'i dkyil 'khor padma can //
translated: is the moon mandala with a lotus.

original: bstan par bya ba'i rgyu nyid phyir //
analyzed: bstan par bya ba'i rgyu nyid phyir //
translated: Because it is the cause of what is to be revealed.

original: dbyangs yig dang po'i thig ler bcas //
analyzed: dbyangs yig dang po'i thig ler bcas //
translated: The first vowel with the bindu

original: zla ba'i 'od ltar snang ba yin //
analyzed: zla ba'i 'od ltar snang ba yin //
translated: is the light that shines like the light of the moon.

original: snang ba'i ye shes yang dag 'byung //🔽zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: snang ba'i ye shes yang dag 'byung // zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: The wisdom of appearance arises perfectly.

original: kun rdzob yul dang dbang po dang // rnam par shes pa 'dus pa las gang gi tshe 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin rnams nyams su myong ba de'i tshe gsal ba'i ngo bo zhes brjod par bya'o //🔽zla ba'i 'od zer lta bu'i snang ba mthong ba'i phyir ram /
analyzed: kun rdzob yul dang dbang po dang // rnam par shes pa 'dus pa las gang gi tshe 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin rnams nyams su myong ba de'i tshe gsal ba'i ngo bo zhes brjod par bya'o // zla ba'i 'od zer lta bu'i snang ba mthong ba'i phyir ram /
translated: When the nature of the engaging consciousnesses is experienced through the coming together of the relative objects, sense faculties, and consciousnesses, that is called the “nature of clarity.”

original: cung zhig gsal ba'i snang ba 'byung ba'i phyir mtshan mo'o //🔽shes rab kyi rang @89a * //
analyzed: cung zhig gsal ba'i snang ba 'byung ba'i phyir mtshan mo'o // shes rab kyi rang @89a * //
translated: Because the light that is seen is like the light rays of the moon, or because the appearance of slight clarity arises, it is night.

original: bzhin yin pa'i phyir bud med kyi ming ste /
analyzed: bzhin yin pa'i phyir bud med kyi ming ste /
translated: Because it is the nature of wisdom, it is called a “woman.”

original: de yang sngar bshad zin to //
analyzed: de yang sngar bshad zin to //
translated: That has already been explained.

original: 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin rnams ni rtsa g-yon pa las byung ba'i rlung dang ldan pa'i rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir g-yon pa ste /
analyzed: 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin rnams ni rtsa g-yon pa las byung ba'i rlung dang ldan pa'i rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir g-yon pa ste /
translated: The nature of the engaging consciousnesses is the essence of the consciousness that is associated with the vāyu that arises from the left nāḍī.

original: rlung ni gang dang gang gnas pa //
analyzed: rlung ni gang dang gang gnas pa //
translated: Wherever the wind abides,

original: rang bzhin de dang de 'byung ngo //
analyzed: rang bzhin de dang de 'byung ngo //
translated: that nature arises.

original: zhes 'chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhes 'chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: This will be explained.

original: chos kyi dbyings kyi 'khor lor padma'i gdan la gnas pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la de bsgom pa'i phyir zla ba'i dkyil 'khor padma can no //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings kyi 'khor lor padma'i gdan la gnas pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la de bsgom pa'i phyir zla ba'i dkyil 'khor padma can no //
translated: In the wheel of the Dharma realm, on a lotus seat, the moon disc is the basis for cultivating that, so it is the moon disc with a lotus.

original: yi ge aa thig les mtshan par de'i rang bzhin gyi yi ge aom gsungs pa'i phyir /
analyzed: yi ge aa thig les mtshan par de'i rang bzhin gyi yi ge aom gsungs pa'i phyir /
translated: The syllable A is marked with a drop, and the syllable Om has the nature of that, so it is the syllable Om.

original: bstan par bya ba'i rgyu nyid phyir //
analyzed: bstan par bya ba'i rgyu nyid phyir //
translated: Because it is the cause of what is to be revealed,

original: zhes bya ba snang ba'i ye shes bstan pa nyid du bskyed pa'i phyir ngag gi lam la brten pa'i sa bon rjes su 'jug pa'i dbyangs te aom mo //
analyzed: zhes bya ba snang ba'i ye shes bstan pa nyid du bskyed pa'i phyir ngag gi lam la brten pa'i sa bon rjes su 'jug pa'i dbyangs te aom mo //
translated: the path of speech is the seed that is engaged, which is the vowel A.

original: de nyid kyi phyir de'i tshe zla ba'i 'od zer ltar snang ba ste /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir de'i tshe zla ba'i 'od zer ltar snang ba ste /
translated: Because of that, at that time, it is like the light of the moon,

original: zla ba'i gsal ba dang mtshungs pa'i snang ba 'byung ba'i phyir //
analyzed: zla ba'i gsal ba dang mtshungs pa'i snang ba 'byung ba'i phyir //
translated: because the appearance that is similar to the radiance of the moon arises.

original: snang ba'i ye shes yang dag 'byung ngo //
analyzed: snang ba'i ye shes yang dag 'byung ngo //
translated: The wisdom of appearance arises perfectly.

original: 'di ni stong pa nyid kyi bdag nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin yin par khong du chud par bya ste /
analyzed: 'di ni stong pa nyid kyi bdag nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin yin par khong du chud par bya ste /
translated: One should understand that this is the meditative concentration that has the nature of emptiness.

original: dgongs pa ma yin pas bshad pa'o //
analyzed: dgongs pa ma yin pas bshad pa'o //
translated: This is an explanation that is not the intended one.🔽Now, in order to teach the purification of the afflicted mind consciousness,

original: da ni nyon mongs pa can gyi yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i rnam par dag pa bstan pa'i phyir //
analyzed: da ni nyon mongs pa can gyi yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i rnam par dag pa bstan pa'i phyir //
translated: it is said:

original: snang ba gsal ba zhes brjod cing /
analyzed: snang ba gsal ba zhes brjod cing /
translated: It is called “the increase of appearance,”🔽and also “the method of emptiness,”

original: shin tu stong pa thabs nyid dang // de bzhin kun du brtags par brjod //
analyzed: shin tu stong pa thabs nyid dang // de bzhin kun du brtags par brjod //
translated: and likewise, “the imagination,”

original: de bzhin sems las byung bar bshad //🔽ces bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: de bzhin sems las byung bar bshad // ces bya ba gsungs te /
translated: and likewise, “the mental factors.”

original: nyon mongs pa can gyi yid kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba gang yin pa de sngar bshad pa'i bsgom pas spangs par gyur pa na snang bar gsal ba zhes brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa can gyi yid kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba gang yin pa de sngar bshad pa'i bsgom pas spangs par gyur pa na snang bar gsal ba zhes brjod par bya ste /
translated: That which is called the afflicted mind consciousness, when it is abandoned through the previously explained meditation, it should be called “the increase of appearance.”

original: nyi ma ltar rab tu gsal bar snang ba'i phyir snang ba 'phel bar gyur pa ni snang ba gsal ba zhes bshad do //
analyzed: nyi ma ltar rab tu gsal bar snang ba'i phyir snang ba 'phel bar gyur pa ni snang ba gsal ba zhes bshad do //
translated: Because it appears as a very clear light, like the sun, the increase of appearance is explained as “the increase of appearance.”

original: rang bzhin bzhi bcu spangs pa'i phyir shin tu stong pa'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin bzhi bcu spangs pa'i phyir shin tu stong pa'o //
translated: It is extremely empty because it is free from the forty natural states.

original: rtsa g-yas pa nas byung ba nyid yin pa'i phyir thabs kyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: rtsa g-yas pa nas byung ba nyid yin pa'i phyir thabs kyi rang bzhin no //
translated: It is the nature of method because it arises from the right channel.

original: bdag tu lta ba la sogs pa bzhi dang reg pa la sogs pa las yongs su brtags pa nyid yin pa'i phyir kun du brtags pa'o //
analyzed: bdag tu lta ba la sogs pa bzhi dang reg pa la sogs pa las yongs su brtags pa nyid yin pa'i phyir kun du brtags pa'o //
translated: It is imagined because it is imagined from the four views of self and so on and from contact and so on.

original: sems dang sems las byung ba dag tha dad pa med pa'i phyir sems las byung ba ste sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
analyzed: sems dang sems las byung ba dag tha dad pa med pa'i phyir sems las byung ba ste sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
translated: It is mental factors because there is no difference between mind and mental factors.

original: da ni de dang 'brel pa'i rang bzhin rnams kyi grangs bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni de dang 'brel pa'i rang bzhin rnams kyi grangs bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: Now, in order to teach the enumeration of the natures that are related to that, it is said:

original: chags dang @89b zhen dang de dga' ba //
analyzed: chags dang @89b zhen dang de dga' ba //
translated: Attachment, clinging, and delight,

original: dga' ba bar ma shin tu dga' //
analyzed: dga' ba bar ma shin tu dga' //
translated: middling delight, and great delight,🔽joy, and complete joy,🔽wonder, and likewise, laughter,

original: rangs dang rab tu mgu ba dang // ngo mtshar de bzhin dgod pa dang // tshim dang 'khyud pa nyid dang ni //
analyzed: rangs dang rab tu mgu ba dang // ngo mtshar de bzhin dgod pa dang // tshim dang 'khyud pa nyid dang ni //
translated: satisfaction, and embracing,

original: 'o byed de bzhin 'jib pa dang // brtan dang brtson dang nga rgyal dang // las dang chos dang stobs dang ni //
analyzed: 'o byed de bzhin 'jib pa dang // brtan dang brtson dang nga rgyal dang // las dang chos dang stobs dang ni //
translated: Kissing, sucking, firm, striving, pride, action, Dharma, power,

original: spro ba dang ni gya tshom nyid //
analyzed: spro ba dang ni gya tshom nyid //
translated: and enthusiasm, and also rashness,

original: de bzhin gya tshom chen po dang // gya tshom par ma drag po dang // rnam par sgeg dang zhe 'gras nyid //
analyzed: de bzhin gya tshom chen po dang // gya tshom par ma drag po dang // rnam par sgeg dang zhe 'gras nyid //
translated: and likewise great rashness, and rashness not too strong, and flirtation, and hostility,

original: dge dang tshig gsal ba bden pa dang / mi bden pa dang de bzhin nges /
analyzed: dge dang tshig gsal ba bden pa dang / mi bden pa dang de bzhin nges /
translated: virtue, clear words, truth, and likewise certainty,

original: nyer len min dang sbyin pa po /
analyzed: nyer len min dang sbyin pa po /
translated: non-appropriation, and the giver,

original: skul dang de bzhin dpa' bo dang // ngo tsha med dang sbyor dag gdug /
analyzed: skul dang de bzhin dpa' bo dang // ngo tsha med dang sbyor dag gdug /
translated: exhortation, and likewise the hero, and shamelessness, and pure application, and poison,

original: g-yo dang gya gyu nyid dag dang // rang bzhin dag ni bzhi bcu ste //
analyzed: g-yo dang gya gyu nyid dag dang // rang bzhin dag ni bzhi bcu ste //
translated: and deceit, and crookedness, and the four natures,

original: shin tu stong pa'i skad cig go //
analyzed: shin tu stong pa'i skad cig go //
translated: are the forty in the moment of utter emptiness.

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Thus it is said.

original: mdo snga ma la rus sbal gyi 'gro stangs kyi tshul gyis rang rig ces bya ba'i tshig rjes su sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: mdo snga ma la rus sbal gyi 'gro stangs kyi tshul gyis rang rig ces bya ba'i tshig rjes su sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: In the previous sutra, the phrase self-awareness should be applied in the manner of a tortoise's gait.

original: des na rang bzhin bzhi bcu po de rnams skad cig ste skad cig re rer 'byung ba rnams ni rang rig pa'i mtshan mas yang dag par khong du chud par byas par bya ba kho na yin no //
analyzed: des na rang bzhin bzhi bcu po de rnams skad cig ste skad cig re rer 'byung ba rnams ni rang rig pa'i mtshan mas yang dag par khong du chud par byas par bya ba kho na yin no //
translated: Therefore, these forty natures, which occur in each moment, should be fully understood by the sign of self-awareness.

original: de rnams dang sngar bshad pa'i rim pas nyon mongs pa can gyi rnam par shes pa log pa ni shin tu stong pas spang bar bya ba'o //🔽nyon mongs pa can gyi yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni bdag tu lta ba dang / bdag tu rmongs pa dang / bdag tu nga rgyal ba dang // bdag la chags pa zhes bya ba //🔽nyon mongs pa bzhi dang // reg pa dang / yid la byed pa dang / tshor ba dang 'du shes dang sems pa ste /
analyzed: de rnams dang sngar bshad pa'i rim pas nyon mongs pa can gyi rnam par shes pa log pa ni shin tu stong pas spang bar bya ba'o // nyon mongs pa can gyi yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni bdag tu lta ba dang / bdag tu rmongs pa dang / bdag tu nga rgyal ba dang // bdag la chags pa zhes bya ba // nyon mongs pa bzhi dang // reg pa dang / yid la byed pa dang / tshor ba dang 'du shes dang sems pa ste /
translated: By the process explained above, the cessation of the afflicted consciousness is to be abandoned by the path of cultivation.🔽The afflicted mental consciousness is associated with four afflictions: the view of self, confusion about self, pride in self, and attachment to self.

original: lnga kun du 'gro ba dang ldan zhing //
analyzed: lnga kun du 'gro ba dang ldan zhing //
translated: It is also associated with five omnipresent factors: contact, attention, feeling, conception, and volition.

original: gzhan dang mi ldan pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: gzhan dang mi ldan pa ma yin nam /
translated: It is not associated with any others.

original: de'i phyir ji ltar rang bzhin bzhi bcu dang ldan pa 'thad par 'gyur ba de bden te 'on kyang nyon mongs pa bzhi'i nang du rang bzhin bzhi bcu 'dus par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de'i phyir ji ltar rang bzhin bzhi bcu dang ldan pa 'thad par 'gyur ba de bden te 'on kyang nyon mongs pa bzhi'i nang du rang bzhin bzhi bcu 'dus par 'gyur te /
translated: Therefore, it is true that the forty natures are tenable, but still, the forty natures are included in the four passions.

original: chags pa nas brtsams nas tshim pa'i bar ni bdag tu lta bar ro //
analyzed: chags pa nas brtsams nas tshim pa'i bar ni bdag tu lta bar ro //
translated: From attachment up to satisfaction are included in the view of self.

original: 'khyud pa nas brtsams nas spro ba'i bar ni bdag tu rmongs par ro //
analyzed: 'khyud pa nas brtsams nas spro ba'i bar ni bdag tu rmongs par ro //
translated: From embrace up to delight are included in delusion about self.

original: gya tshom nas brtsams te mi bden pa'i bar ni bdag tu nga rgyal bar ro /
analyzed: gya tshom nas brtsams te mi bden pa'i bar ni bdag tu nga rgyal bar ro /
translated: From recklessness up to unreality are included in pride about self.

original: nges pa nas brtsams te gya gyu'i bar ni bdag la chags par 'dus te 'du byed lnga bcu rtsa gcig bzhin no //
analyzed: nges pa nas brtsams te gya gyu'i bar ni bdag la chags par 'dus te 'du byed lnga bcu rtsa gcig bzhin no //
translated: From certainty up to crookedness are included in attachment to self, just as the fifty-one mental formations are included in the four passions.

original: de rnams sems las byung ba yin bzhin du yang rtsa ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams su @90a * //
analyzed: de rnams sems las byung ba yin bzhin du yang rtsa ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams su @90a * //
translated: Although they are mental factors, they are included in the root passions.

original: 'dus par 'gyur te sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
analyzed: 'dus par 'gyur te sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
translated: This is literal.

original: da ni don dang mthun pa'i ming rnams //
analyzed: da ni don dang mthun pa'i ming rnams //
translated: Now, the names that accord with the meaning

original: nyin mo skyes pa zhes bya dang / rtsub mo'i rnam par bstan pa yin //
analyzed: nyin mo skyes pa zhes bya dang / rtsub mo'i rnam par bstan pa yin //
translated: are taught in the form of the rough.

original: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya dang // de bzhin rdo rje nyid ces bya //
analyzed: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya dang // de bzhin rdo rje nyid ces bya //
translated: and likewise the “vajra” itself.🔽The part should be known as that

original: thig le gnyis kyis brgyan pa yi //🔽cha ru de nyid shes par bya //🔽nyi ma'i 'od zer lta bu yi //
analyzed: thig le gnyis kyis brgyan pa yi // cha ru de nyid shes par bya // nyi ma'i 'od zer lta bu yi //
translated: which is adorned with two drops.🔽The pristine wisdom of the clear light

original: snang ba gsal ba'i ye shes 'byung //
analyzed: snang ba gsal ba'i ye shes 'byung //
translated: arises like the sun’s light rays.

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Thus it is said.

original: de la snang ba 'phel ba'i rab tu gsal ba ni nyi ma lta bur snang ba'i phyir nyin mo zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de la snang ba 'phel ba'i rab tu gsal ba ni nyi ma lta bur snang ba'i phyir nyin mo zhes bya'o //
translated: Therein, the increase of light is called “day” because it shines like the sun.

original: thabs kyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir skyes pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: thabs kyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir skyes pa zhes bya'o //
translated: It is called “male” because it is of the nature of method.

original: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor lta bu'i snang ba dang ldan pa'i phyir rtsub mo nyid do //
analyzed: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor lta bu'i snang ba dang ldan pa'i phyir rtsub mo nyid do //
translated: It is “rough” because it possesses the light of the sun-disk.

original: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du rdo rje'i gdan la dbyangs yig dang po'i thig le gnyis kyis rnam par brgyan pa bkod de dag gi sa bon bsdus pas nyi ma dang mtshungs pa'i snang ba'i tshogs 'byung ba na snang ba gsal ba'i ye shes nyon mongs pa
analyzed: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du rdo rje'i gdan la dbyangs yig dang po'i thig le gnyis kyis rnam par brgyan pa bkod de dag gi sa bon bsdus pas nyi ma dang mtshungs pa'i snang ba'i tshogs 'byung ba na snang ba gsal ba'i ye shes nyon mongs pa
translated: The first vowel drop is placed on the vajra seat on the sun-disk, adorned with two drops. When the collection of lights similar to the sun arises from the gathering of the seed syllables, the pristine wisdom of the clear light of affliction

original: can gyi yid kyi rnam par shes par gyur pa'i mtshan nyid can 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: can gyi yid kyi rnam par shes par gyur pa'i mtshan nyid can 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that the mind consciousness of the sentient being, which has the characteristic of being produced, will arise.

original: dgongs pa ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: dgongs pa ma yin pa'o //
translated: This is not the intended meaning.

original: da ni kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa'i rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: da ni kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa'i rnam par dag pa /
translated: Now, the purity of the foundation consciousness🔽is the attainment of light

original: snang ba nye bar thob pa dang // de bzhin nye bar thob pa nyid //🔽yongs su grub pa nyid dang ni //
analyzed: snang ba nye bar thob pa dang // de bzhin nye bar thob pa nyid // yongs su grub pa nyid dang ni //
translated: and likewise the attainment itself

original: ma rig pa zhes bya ba nyid //
analyzed: ma rig pa zhes bya ba nyid //
translated: and the so-called ignorance.

original: stong pa chen po'i tshig dang ni //
analyzed: stong pa chen po'i tshig dang ni //
translated: The words of the great emptiness

original: rnam grangs 'di dag rgyal bas gsungs //🔽zhes ba gsungs te /
analyzed: rnam grangs 'di dag rgyal bas gsungs // zhes ba gsungs te /
translated: and the synonyms have been taught by the Victor.

original: snang ba nye bar thob pa zhes bya ba la zla ba dang nyi ma dang 'brel ba'i snang ba gnyis nye bar thob pa ste /
analyzed: snang ba nye bar thob pa zhes bya ba la zla ba dang nyi ma dang 'brel ba'i snang ba gnyis nye bar thob pa ste /
translated: The attainment of light means the attainment of the two lights connected with the sun and moon.

original: de dag tu snang ba dang bral nas mtshams kyi rab tu gsal ba lta bu'i snang ba nye bar thob pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de dag tu snang ba dang bral nas mtshams kyi rab tu gsal ba lta bu'i snang ba nye bar thob pa zhes bya'o //
translated: When one is free from the appearances of those two, the attainment of the light that is like the illumination of the horizon is called the attainment of light.

original: de bzhin du nye bar thob pa zhes bya ba ni de lta bu'i rang bzhin kho nar nye bar thob pa yin gyi nyi ma dang zla ba la sogs pa gzhan du ni ma yin no zhes gzhan dang ldan pa rnam par gcod pa yin te /
analyzed: de bzhin du nye bar thob pa zhes bya ba ni de lta bu'i rang bzhin kho nar nye bar thob pa yin gyi nyi ma dang zla ba la sogs pa gzhan du ni ma yin no zhes gzhan dang ldan pa rnam par gcod pa yin te /
translated: This is the exclusion of other.

original: srid sgrub 'phong skyen zhes bya ba bzhin no //
analyzed: srid sgrub 'phong skyen zhes bya ba bzhin no //
translated: It is like the expression “Arjuna is a great archer.”

original: kun gzhi rnam par shes pa gyur pa'i rang bzhin yin pas dgra bcom pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyi ni yongs su grub pa ste /
analyzed: kun gzhi rnam par shes pa gyur pa'i rang bzhin yin pas dgra bcom pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyi ni yongs su grub pa ste /
translated: The perfected nature is the nature of the transformation of the storehouse consciousness, because it is the characteristic of the state of an arhat.

original: de gyur pa ni dgra bcom pa nyid yin no zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de gyur pa ni dgra bcom pa nyid yin no zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because it is said, “The transformation of the storehouse consciousness is the state of an arhat.”

original: rnam par shes pa thams cad kyi 'byung ba'i sa bon thams cad pa nyid ma rig pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa thams cad kyi 'byung ba'i sa bon thams cad pa nyid ma rig pa zhes bya'o //
translated: The universal seed of all consciousnesses is called ignorance.

original: yang na lung du ma bstan @90b pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ming dang gzugs la sogs pa rnams dang reg pa dang yid la byed pa dang / tshor ba dang 'du shes dang sems pa rnams rig par mi shes pas ma rig pa ste kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa ste /
analyzed: yang na lung du ma bstan @90b pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ming dang gzugs la sogs pa rnams dang reg pa dang yid la byed pa dang / tshor ba dang 'du shes dang sems pa rnams rig par mi shes pas ma rig pa ste kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa ste /
translated: Or else, because it is indeterminate, it is ignorance, since it is not known to be the name-and-form, etc., contact, attention, feeling, perception, and volition.

original: tshor ba btang snyoms kyi rang bzhin dang ldan pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: tshor ba btang snyoms kyi rang bzhin dang ldan pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: It is the store-consciousness, and it has the nature of indifferent feeling.

original: gnyen po stong pa chen pos spang bar bya ba nyid yin pa'i phyir stong pa chen po snang ba nye bar thob pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: gnyen po stong pa chen pos spang bar bya ba nyid yin pa'i phyir stong pa chen po snang ba nye bar thob pa'i ye shes so //
translated: It is the great emptiness, because it is to be abandoned by the antidote of great emptiness, which is the intuition that attains the light of the great emptiness.

original: de'i rnam grangs 'di rnams rgyal bas gsungs shing bstan to zhes bya bas rang gi 'dod pa yin pa 'gog par byed de /
analyzed: de'i rnam grangs 'di rnams rgyal bas gsungs shing bstan to zhes bya bas rang gi 'dod pa yin pa 'gog par byed de /
translated: The Victor has taught and explained these synonyms.

original: sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
analyzed: sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
translated: This is literal.

original: de'i rang bzhin ni /
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin ni /
translated: Its nature is:🔽The moment of middling attachment,

original: chags pa bar ma'i skad cig dang // brjed ngas pa dang 'khrul pa nyid //
analyzed: chags pa bar ma'i skad cig dang // brjed ngas pa dang 'khrul pa nyid //
translated: forgetfulness, and error.

original: mi smrar gyur dang skyo ba dang // le lo de bzhin rmugs pa ste /
analyzed: mi smrar gyur dang skyo ba dang // le lo de bzhin rmugs pa ste /
translated: sloth, and likewise, torpor,

original: ma rig skad cig bdun po ni //🔽phra mo'i rnal 'byor bas shes bya //
analyzed: ma rig skad cig bdun po ni // phra mo'i rnal 'byor bas shes bya //
translated: are the seven moments of nescience.

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: They are to be known by the yogi of subtle discernment.

original: kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa ni reg pa dang yid la byed pa dang tshor ba dang 'du shes dang sems pa rnams dang rtag tu ldan pa yin mod kyi 'on kyang snga ma bzhin du bdun po rnams de rnams kho nar 'dus pa rnam par bshad par🔽bya'o // de rnams ni phra mo'i rnal 'byor pa zhes bya ba shes rab phra zhing shin tu rno ba dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis shes par bya ste kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa de kho na nyid kyi blo gros rno ba rnams kyis shes par bya
analyzed: kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa ni reg pa dang yid la byed pa dang tshor ba dang 'du shes dang sems pa rnams dang rtag tu ldan pa yin mod kyi 'on kyang snga ma bzhin du bdun po rnams de rnams kho nar 'dus pa rnam par bshad par bya'o // de rnams ni phra mo'i rnal 'byor pa zhes bya ba shes rab phra zhing shin tu rno ba dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis shes par bya ste kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa de kho na nyid kyi blo gros rno ba rnams kyis shes par bya
translated: The consciousness of the ground-of-all is always associated with contact, attention, feeling, conception, and impulse. However, as before, the seven are included in just those.🔽This should be explained in the Vrtti.

original: ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: They are to be known by the yogis of subtle discernment, that is, by the yogis who have subtle, very sharp discernment, because they are to be known by those whose intelligence is sharp with respect to the reality of the consciousness of the ground-of-all.

original: da ni don dang mthun pa'i ming //
analyzed: da ni don dang mthun pa'i ming //
translated: Now, the name that accords with the meaning.

original: sa bon gyi thig ler ldan pa min //
analyzed: sa bon gyi thig ler ldan pa min //
translated: Not endowed with the seed-essence.

original: rlung gi sgo nas 'byung ba med //
analyzed: rlung gi sgo nas 'byung ba med //
translated: Not issuing forth by way of the wind.

original: snang ba thob pa gang yin te //
analyzed: snang ba thob pa gang yin te //
translated: That which is attained as appearance

original: yongs su grub pa'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: yongs su grub pa'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: is the characteristic of the consummate.

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: This is stated.

original: sa bon yi ge aa la sogs pa thig ler ldan pa ste /🔽rjes su 'jug pa'i dbyangs dang tsheg drag dang yang dag par ldan pa yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: sa bon yi ge aa la sogs pa thig ler ldan pa ste / rjes su 'jug pa'i dbyangs dang tsheg drag dang yang dag par ldan pa yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Not endowed with the seed-essence, the letter A and so forth,🔽not endowed with the vowels and the visarga that follow after.

original: sna'i bu ga'i sgo dag nas rlung 'byung ba ste 'gro ba dang 'ong ba'i 'brel ba yang med do //
analyzed: sna'i bu ga'i sgo dag nas rlung 'byung ba ste 'gro ba dang 'ong ba'i 'brel ba yang med do //
translated: Not issuing forth by way of the wind, not connected with the going and coming of the wind through the nostrils.🔽That pristine wisdom which is attained as appearance, that is the consummate,

original: mtshams kyi snang ba tsam 'ba' zhig tu snang ba'i phyir snang ba nye bar thob pa'i ye shes de nyid yongs su grub pa ste /🔽kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa gyur nas //
analyzed: mtshams kyi snang ba tsam 'ba' zhig tu snang ba'i phyir snang ba nye bar thob pa'i ye shes de nyid yongs su grub pa ste / kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa gyur nas //
translated: because it appears as just the appearance of the juncture.🔽It is said to be the consummate, having become the ālaya consciousness.

original: yongs su ste kun nas grub pa nyid yin par brjod do zhes bya ba ni dgongs pa ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: yongs su ste kun nas grub pa nyid yin par brjod do zhes bya ba ni dgongs pa ma yin pa'o //
translated: This is not the intended meaning.

original: da ni mjug bsdu ba //
analyzed: da ni mjug bsdu ba //
translated: Now, the conclusion:

original: rang bzhin phra ba brgya @91a * //
analyzed: rang bzhin phra ba brgya @91a * //
translated: The subtle nature

original: dang ni // drug cu tham pa 'di rnams ni //
analyzed: dang ni // drug cu tham pa 'di rnams ni //
translated: These sixty are

original: rlung gi bzhon pa can gyi rgyus //
analyzed: rlung gi bzhon pa can gyi rgyus //
translated: The causes of the winds as their mounts.

original: nyin dang mtshan du 'byung ba yin //
analyzed: nyin dang mtshan du 'byung ba yin //
translated: They occur day and night.

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Thus it is said.

original: thabs dang shes rab dang ma rig pa'i ngo bo'i rang bzhin brgya drug cu 'di rnams nyin dang mtshan du brgya drug cu 'byung ngo //
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab dang ma rig pa'i ngo bo'i rang bzhin brgya drug cu 'di rnams nyin dang mtshan du brgya drug cu 'byung ngo //
translated: These one hundred and sixty, which are the nature of method, wisdom, and ignorance, occur one hundred and sixty times day and night.

original: de nyid kyi phyir de rnams ni phra ba yin te /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir de rnams ni phra ba yin te /
translated: For that very reason, they are subtle,

original: rang gis rig par bya ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang gis rig par bya ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because they are to be known by oneself.

original: rlung gi bzhon pa can te rnam par shes pa dang byed rgyu'i rgyu des 'byung ba ni skye zhing 'gag pa'o //
analyzed: rlung gi bzhon pa can te rnam par shes pa dang byed rgyu'i rgyu des 'byung ba ni skye zhing 'gag pa'o //
translated: They are the causes of the winds as their mounts, and consciousness and the active causes arise through them.

original: dbang phyug la sogs rgyu can nam rgyu med pa can dag ma yin te sngar bkag pa nyid kho na yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dbang phyug la sogs rgyu can nam rgyu med pa can dag ma yin te sngar bkag pa nyid kho na yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: They are not caused by Īśvara and so on or causeless, because that has already been refuted.

original: rgyu med pa nyid yin te /
analyzed: rgyu med pa nyid yin te /
translated: They are causeless,

original: thams cad rtag tu 'byung ba'am res 'ga' yang mi 'byung ste /
analyzed: thams cad rtag tu 'byung ba'am res 'ga' yang mi 'byung ste /
translated: because everything would either always arise or never arise,

original: rgyu med gzhan la mi ltos phyir //
analyzed: rgyu med gzhan la mi ltos phyir //
translated: because they do not depend on another cause.

original: rtag tu yod pa'am med par 'gyur //
analyzed: rtag tu yod pa'am med par 'gyur //
translated: would always exist or not exist.

original: dngos po rnams ni res 'ga' zhig /'byung ba ltos pa las yin no //🔽zhes gang bshad pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po rnams ni res 'ga' zhig /'byung ba ltos pa las yin no // zhes gang bshad pa'o //
translated: Things arise sometimes, due to dependence.

original: de ltar na rnam par shes pa gsum ni sems yin la rang bzhin rnams ni sems las byung ba yin pa'i phyir 'khor ba'i 'khor lo ma lus pa ni de'i rang bzhin kho na yin te yang dang yang du skye zhing 'jig par 'gyur bas /
analyzed: de ltar na rnam par shes pa gsum ni sems yin la rang bzhin rnams ni sems las byung ba yin pa'i phyir 'khor ba'i 'khor lo ma lus pa ni de'i rang bzhin kho na yin te yang dang yang du skye zhing 'jig par 'gyur bas /
translated: Thus, since the three consciousnesses are mind and the natures are mental factors, the entire wheel of cyclic existence is just their nature, since they are repeatedly born and perish.

original: de dgag pa'i phyir stong pa nyid la sogs pa'i rim pas lam bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba ni dgongs pa ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: de dgag pa'i phyir stong pa nyid la sogs pa'i rim pas lam bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba ni dgongs pa ma yin pa'o //
translated: Therefore, in order to stop them, the path should be cultivated through the stages of emptiness and so forth.🔽This is not the intended meaning.

original: da ni dus kyi dbye ba'i sgo nas 'byung ba'i rim pa /
analyzed: da ni dus kyi dbye ba'i sgo nas 'byung ba'i rim pa /
translated: Now, the order of arising from the perspective of a division of time is stated:🔽A moment, a second, a minute,

original: skad cig thang cig yud tsam dang // mig 'dzums de bzhin thal mo ru //
analyzed: skad cig thang cig yud tsam dang // mig 'dzums de bzhin thal mo ru //
translated: a blink of the eye, and likewise a palm-tree period,🔽a water-clock period, a day and night,

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: a month, and a year.

original: rang bzhin de rnams skad cig re re dang thang cig re re dang yud tsam la sogs pa rnams su yul de dang de nyams su myong ba'am /
analyzed: rang bzhin de rnams skad cig re re dang thang cig re re dang yud tsam la sogs pa rnams su yul de dang de nyams su myong ba'am /
translated: These natures are experienced in each instant, in each moment, in each period of time, etc.

original: sngar 'das pa'i yul rjes su dran pa'i sgo nas 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sngar 'das pa'i yul rjes su dran pa'i sgo nas 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Or they occur through the recollection of past objects.

original: de nas rnal 'byor pa phra mo'i lta ba can gyis de rnams skad cig la sogs pa'i dbye ba la brten nas ngo shes par bya ste /
analyzed: de nas rnal 'byor pa phra mo'i lta ba can gyis de rnams skad cig la sogs pa'i dbye ba la brten nas ngo shes par bya ste /
translated: Then, the yogi who has the subtle view should recognize them based on the division of instants, etc.

original: gzhan du na sems dang sems las byung ba rnams kyi rnam par dbye ba mi shes pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan du na sems dang sems las byung ba rnams kyi rnam par dbye ba mi shes pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Otherwise, the distinction of mind and mental factors would not be known.

original: skad cig gang la rang bzhin dge ba'am mi dge ba'am bar ma gang byung zhes rnam par dpyod par byed pa na /
analyzed: skad cig gang la rang bzhin dge ba'am mi dge ba'am bar ma gang byung zhes rnam par dpyod par byed pa na /
translated: When analyzing, “In which instant did a virtuous, non-virtuous, or neutral nature arise?,”

original: rab tu dbye ba shes par byas nas de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin mngon du bya'o //
analyzed: rab tu dbye ba shes par byas nas de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin mngon du bya'o //
translated: having understood the distinctions, one should manifest such samādhi.

original: gzhan du na ting nge 'dzin rnams 'dres par 'gyur te /
analyzed: gzhan du na ting nge 'dzin rnams 'dres par 'gyur te /
translated: Otherwise, the samādhis would be mixed.

original: de'i @91b phyir rang bzhin rnams dgag par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i @91b phyir rang bzhin rnams dgag par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, the natures would not be stopped.

original: shin tu phra ba'i blo can gyi yul du gyur pa'i spyod pas gang gi tshe rang bzhin dang rnam par shes pa'i bye brag shes pa de'i tshe myur du sems rnam par dag pa thob par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni bsdus pa'i don te dgongs pa ma yin
analyzed: shin tu phra ba'i blo can gyi yul du gyur pa'i spyod pas gang gi tshe rang bzhin dang rnam par shes pa'i bye brag shes pa de'i tshe myur du sems rnam par dag pa thob par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni bsdus pa'i don te dgongs pa ma yin
translated: The summarized meaning is: “When one knows the distinctions of nature and consciousness through conduct that is the domain of those with very subtle minds, then one will quickly attain a pure mind.” This is not the implied meaning.

original: pa'o // da ni skad cig la sogs pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid /🔽skad cig se gol gtogs par bshad //
analyzed: pa'o // da ni skad cig la sogs pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid / skad cig se gol gtogs par bshad //
translated: Now, the characteristics of moments and so forth are stated:🔽A moment is explained as the snapping of fingers.

original: thang cig yungs kar bskor ba tsam //
analyzed: thang cig yungs kar bskor ba tsam //
translated: A second is the time to roll an oil-seed.

original: yud tsam dbugs dbyung rngub pa yin //
analyzed: yud tsam dbugs dbyung rngub pa yin //
translated: A minute is the time to inhale and exhale.

original: mig 'dzums mig ni 'dzums pa yin //
analyzed: mig 'dzums mig ni 'dzums pa yin //
translated: A blink is the time to blink.

original: thal mo lag gnyis brdabs pa ste //🔽skad cig la sogs mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: thal mo lag gnyis brdabs pa ste // skad cig la sogs mtshan nyid do //
translated: A clap is the sound of two hands clapping.

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /🔽se gol gyi sgra dus ji srid cig tu 'byung ba de ni skad cig go //
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te / se gol gyi sgra dus ji srid cig tu 'byung ba de ni skad cig go //
translated: These are the characteristics of moments and so forth.🔽A moment is the duration of the sound of a finger snap.

original: yungs kar gyi 'bras bu dus ji srid cig tu bskor ba ste lag pa la sogs par bskor ba de ni thang cig go //
analyzed: yungs kar gyi 'bras bu dus ji srid cig tu bskor ba ste lag pa la sogs par bskor ba de ni thang cig go //
translated: A second is the time to roll an oil-seed, that is, to roll it in the hand and so forth.

original: srog ces bya ba'i rlung snying gnas gdong gi sna'i bu ga dag la ji srid cig tu 'byung ba de ni yid tsam mo ;
analyzed: srog ces bya ba'i rlung snying gnas gdong gi sna'i bu ga dag la ji srid cig tu 'byung ba de ni yid tsam mo ;
translated: The life-force wind arises in the nose-tip of the face, which is the location of the heart, for a short time, which is a moment.

original: / dus ji srid cig mig dang 'dzums par 'gyur ba de ni mig 'dzums so //
analyzed: / dus ji srid cig mig dang 'dzums par 'gyur ba de ni mig 'dzums so //
translated: The time it takes for the eyes to open and close is a blink.

original: dus ji srid du lag pa gnyis brdabs pa de ni thal mo brdabs pa ste /
analyzed: dus ji srid du lag pa gnyis brdabs pa de ni thal mo brdabs pa ste /
translated: The time it takes to clap one’s hands is a snap.

original: de rnams skad cig la sogs pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid du shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de rnams skad cig la sogs pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid du shes par bya'o //
translated: These should be understood as the characteristics of moments and so forth.

original: dus kyi mtshan nyid ni rang bzhin rnams kyi 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid yongs su shes par bya ba'i don du bshad do //
analyzed: dus kyi mtshan nyid ni rang bzhin rnams kyi 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid yongs su shes par bya ba'i don du bshad do //
translated: The characteristics of time are explained for the purpose of understanding the characteristics of the arising of the natures.

original: 'di skad du bshad pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad du bshad pa yin te /
translated: This is explained as follows.

original: dus de tsam las yun thung ba'am ring bar rang bzhin rnams 'byung bar mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: dus de tsam las yun thung ba'am ring bar rang bzhin rnams 'byung bar mi 'gyur te /
translated: The natures do not arise for a time shorter or longer than that.

original: de rnams ni shin tu phra ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de rnams ni shin tu phra ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they are extremely subtle.

original: de'i phyir rnal 'byor pas skad cig la sogs pa'i dus kyi dbye bas rang bzhin rnams ngo shes par bya zhing /
analyzed: de'i phyir rnal 'byor pas skad cig la sogs pa'i dus kyi dbye bas rang bzhin rnams ngo shes par bya zhing /
translated: Therefore the yogi should recognize the natures by the divisions of time, such as moments.

original: shes nas de dang rjes su mthun pa'i gnyen po bsten par bya ste sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
analyzed: shes nas de dang rjes su mthun pa'i gnyen po bsten par bya ste sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
translated: Having understood, one should rely on the corresponding antidote.

original: da ni ji ltar 'khor ba'i 'khor lo rlung dang ldan pa'i rnam par shes pa'i dbang gi 'byung ba dang de rnams dgag pa ste gnyi ga bstan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: da ni ji ltar 'khor ba'i 'khor lo rlung dang ldan pa'i rnam par shes pa'i dbang gi 'byung ba dang de rnams dgag pa ste gnyi ga bstan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Now, in order to teach both the wheel of samsara and the elements that are under the power of consciousness endowed with wind, and their cessation,🔽the verse states:

original: rang rig tsam gyi ye shes ni //
analyzed: rang rig tsam gyi ye shes ni //
translated: The wisdom of mere self-awareness

original: nam mkha' lta bur mtshan nyid med //
analyzed: nam mkha' lta bur mtshan nyid med //
translated: is like space, without characteristics.

original: 'on kyang de yi dbye yod do //
analyzed: 'on kyang de yi dbye yod do //
translated: Nevertheless, its divisions exist,

original: mtshan mo nyid mo mtshams bdag nyid //🔽ces bya ba gsungs te /🔽re zhig dang por shes pa ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam pa dang bral ba'i rang bzhin gyis stong ba rnal 'byor gyi mngon @92a * //
analyzed: mtshan mo nyid mo mtshams bdag nyid // ces bya ba gsungs te / re zhig dang por shes pa ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam pa dang bral ba'i rang bzhin gyis stong ba rnal 'byor gyi mngon @92a * //
translated: like night, day, and the junction itself.

original: sum gyi tshad mas rtogs par bya ba rang rig tsam ste /
analyzed: sum gyi tshad mas rtogs par bya ba rang rig tsam ste /
translated: First, the knowledge that is to be realized by the valid cognition of yogic direct perception, which is free from the aspects of apprehended and apprehender, is mere self-awareness.

original: chos kyi sku'i rang bzhin yin yang rnam par shes pa ni thog ma med pa'i ma rig pa'i bag chags goms pa'i dbang gis nam mkha' lta bu ste nam mkha' dang mtshungs par skye ba dang rga ba dang 'chi ba'i mtshan nyid dag dang bral ba yin yang
analyzed: chos kyi sku'i rang bzhin yin yang rnam par shes pa ni thog ma med pa'i ma rig pa'i bag chags goms pa'i dbang gis nam mkha' lta bu ste nam mkha' dang mtshungs par skye ba dang rga ba dang 'chi ba'i mtshan nyid dag dang bral ba yin yang
translated: Although it is the nature of the dharmakāya, consciousness arises like space, due to the power of habituation to the latent tendencies of beginningless ignorance. Although it is free from the characteristics of birth, aging, and death,

original: / gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i ngo bo nyid du gyur nas rags pa'i rang bzhin nyid du gyur te /
analyzed: / gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i ngo bo nyid du gyur nas rags pa'i rang bzhin nyid du gyur te /
translated: it becomes the nature of the apprehended and the apprehender, and thus becomes the nature of the coarse.

original: mi shes pa'i mun pa'i dbang gis rang gi ngo bo brjed par gyur nas bdag tu 'dzin pa dang bdag gir 'dzin pa la brten te /
analyzed: mi shes pa'i mun pa'i dbang gis rang gi ngo bo brjed par gyur nas bdag tu 'dzin pa dang bdag gir 'dzin pa la brten te /
translated: Due to the power of the darkness of ignorance, it forgets its own nature and, based on the grasping of “I” and “mine,”

original: rnam par shes pa brgyad kyi rang bzhin du 'byung ngo //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa brgyad kyi rang bzhin du 'byung ngo //
translated: it arises as the nature of the eight consciousnesses.

original: de yang 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa dang nyon mongs pa can gyi yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa'i dbang gis dbye ba gsum la brten nas 'byung ba na 'khor bar 'khor bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de yang 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa dang nyon mongs pa can gyi yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa'i dbang gis dbye ba gsum la brten nas 'byung ba na 'khor bar 'khor bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Moreover, when it arises based on the three divisions by the power of the active consciousness, the afflicted mental consciousness, and the fundamental consciousness, it revolves in cyclic existence.

original: de la ji ltar dbye ba yod ce na mtshan mo ni 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa'o //
analyzed: de la ji ltar dbye ba yod ce na mtshan mo ni 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa'o //
translated: How is it divided? Night is the active consciousness.

original: nyin mo ni nyon mongs pa can gyi yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o //
analyzed: nyin mo ni nyon mongs pa can gyi yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o //
translated: Day is the afflicted mental consciousness.

original: mtshams ni kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa ste /
analyzed: mtshams ni kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa ste /
translated: The junction is the fundamental consciousness.

original: de nyid la rnam par dag pa'i sgo nas snang ba la sogs pa rnams kyi ming btags so //
analyzed: de nyid la rnam par dag pa'i sgo nas snang ba la sogs pa rnams kyi ming btags so //
translated: In it, by way of purification, the names of light, etc., are designated.

original: sems 'di ni rnam pa gsum du bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo dang rgyud kyi rgyal po de dang de rnams su bshad cing ston to //
analyzed: sems 'di ni rnam pa gsum du bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo dang rgyud kyi rgyal po de dang de rnams su bshad cing ston to //
translated: This mind is explained and taught by the Lord in this and that sūtra and tantra king as threefold.

original: 'dis ni rang gi 'dod pa tsam yin pa 'gog par byed de /
analyzed: 'dis ni rang gi 'dod pa tsam yin pa 'gog par byed de /
translated: This refutes the mere assertion of others.

original: sems de'i sgrub pa ste skye ba sgrub pa'i rgyu bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: sems de'i sgrub pa ste skye ba sgrub pa'i rgyu bshad par bya ste /
translated: The cause of the generation of that mind, its practice, will now be explained.

original: rlung rnams stong pa'i gzugs kyis ni //
analyzed: rlung rnams stong pa'i gzugs kyis ni //
translated: The winds in the form of emptiness

original: shes dang yang dag 'dres gyur nas //
analyzed: shes dang yang dag 'dres gyur nas //
translated: Mix perfectly with consciousness

original: dbang po'i lam nas byung nas ni //
analyzed: dbang po'i lam nas byung nas ni //
translated: And emerge from the path of the sense organ

original: yul rnams la ni dmigs par byed //
analyzed: yul rnams la ni dmigs par byed //
translated: And focus on objects.🔽Here, a gandharva being, urged by the faults of birth and the latent tendencies of karma, who is in the intermediate state of existence with all the sense organs complete, is urged by the latent tendencies of attachment and aversion.

original: 'dir skye ba dang las kyi bag chags kyi nyes pas bskul ba'i dri za'i sems can dbang po kun dang ldan pa'i srid pa bar ma'i gnas skabs na gnas pa 'dod chags dang zhe sdang gi bag chags dag gis bskul nas de'i tshe skyes pa dang bud med
analyzed: 'dir skye ba dang las kyi bag chags kyi nyes pas bskul ba'i dri za'i sems can dbang po kun dang ldan pa'i srid pa bar ma'i gnas skabs na gnas pa 'dod chags dang zhe sdang gi bag chags dag gis bskul nas de'i tshe skyes pa dang bud med
translated: At that time, a man or woman

original: kyi dbang po sbyor ba'i skabs su mngal gyi nang du 'jug ste /
analyzed: kyi dbang po sbyor ba'i skabs su mngal gyi nang du 'jug ste /
translated: enters the womb in the context of the union of the organs.

original: de dag gi khu ba dang khrag dag gis gtums nas mer mer po dang gor gor po dang rkang lag 'gyus pa dang / rus pa dang pags pa dang spu la sogs pa'i dngos pos zla ba dgu dang bcu'i rim gyis srog chags kyi dngos po nyid du gyur nas @92b ma'i lto ba nas byung ste /
analyzed: de dag gi khu ba dang khrag dag gis gtums nas mer mer po dang gor gor po dang rkang lag 'gyus pa dang / rus pa dang pags pa dang spu la sogs pa'i dngos pos zla ba dgu dang bcu'i rim gyis srog chags kyi dngos po nyid du gyur nas @92b ma'i lto ba nas byung ste /
translated: After nine or ten months, the embryo becomes a living being with bones, skin, hair, and so on, and it emerges from the mother’s womb.

original: dngos po rnams mthong ba dang thos pa dang snom pa dang za ba dang reg pa dang shes par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po rnams mthong ba dang thos pa dang snom pa dang za ba dang reg pa dang shes par byed do //
translated: Then it sees, hears, smells, tastes, touches, and cognizes things.

original: de nas 'dod chags dang zhe sdang la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams kyis 'khyams pa dang / yang dang yang du 'chi zhing de kho na bzhin du skye bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: de nas 'dod chags dang zhe sdang la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams kyis 'khyams pa dang / yang dang yang du 'chi zhing de kho na bzhin du skye bar 'gyur te /
translated: Then it wanders about due to the afflictions and secondary afflictions such as desire and hatred, and it dies and is reborn again and again in the same way.

original: de ltar 'khor ba'i btson ra'i sdug bsngal mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa'i 'gro ba drug tu zo chun gyi 'khrul 'khor bzhin du skye ba ni sems can rnams kyi skye ba'i lam yin no //
analyzed: de ltar 'khor ba'i btson ra'i sdug bsngal mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa'i 'gro ba drug tu zo chun gyi 'khrul 'khor bzhin du skye ba ni sems can rnams kyi skye ba'i lam yin no //
translated: Thus, the path of birth of sentient beings is to be born in the six realms of transmigrating beings, who possess infinite suffering in the prison of cyclic existence, like a waterwheel.

original: de nyid ston te /
analyzed: de nyid ston te /
translated: That is taught:

original: rlung de srog la sogs pa'i rlung gi tshogs rnams stong pa'i gzugs te rang bzhin gyis stong pas zhes pa ste /
analyzed: rlung de srog la sogs pa'i rlung gi tshogs rnams stong pa'i gzugs te rang bzhin gyis stong pas zhes pa ste /
translated: That wind is the collection of the winds of life and so on, empty forms, empty by nature.

original: rig pa tsam gyi rnam par shes pa dang ldan pa'i dri za'i sems can ma'i mngal du khu ba dang khrag gi thig le dag dang yang dag par 'dres par gyur nas so //
analyzed: rig pa tsam gyi rnam par shes pa dang ldan pa'i dri za'i sems can ma'i mngal du khu ba dang khrag gi thig le dag dang yang dag par 'dres par gyur nas so //
translated: Having become completely mixed with the drops of semen and blood in the womb of a gandharva sentient being who possesses mere awareness consciousness,

original: phyis byung nas te mngal nas byung nas dbang po'i lam nas te mig la sogs pa'i dbang po'i sgo nas gzugs la sogs pa'i yul rnams la dmigs shing 'dzin par byed de //
analyzed: phyis byung nas te mngal nas byung nas dbang po'i lam nas te mig la sogs pa'i dbang po'i sgo nas gzugs la sogs pa'i yul rnams la dmigs shing 'dzin par byed de //
translated: later, having emerged, having emerged from the womb, through the path of the sense organs, through the doors of the sense organs of the eyes and so on, they focus on and apprehend objects such as form and so on.

original: de'i tshe mig dang gzugs dang rna ba dag yid la byed pa'i mthus mig la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa rnams skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni sems kyi skye ba'i tshul yin te dgongs pa ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: de'i tshe mig dang gzugs dang rna ba dag yid la byed pa'i mthus mig la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa rnams skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni sems kyi skye ba'i tshul yin te dgongs pa ma yin pa'o //
translated: At that time, the eye, form, and ear consciousnesses arise through the power of attention to the eye, form, and ear. This is the way the mind arises, but it is not the intended meaning.

original: da ni sems las byung ba'i rang bzhin rnams kyi skye ba'i tshul //
analyzed: da ni sems las byung ba'i rang bzhin rnams kyi skye ba'i tshul //
translated: Now, the way the mental factors arise is as follows.

original: rlung ni bzhon pa nyid gyur nas //
analyzed: rlung ni bzhon pa nyid gyur nas //
translated: The wind becomes their mount.

original: gang tshe snang ba ldan gyur pa //
analyzed: gang tshe snang ba ldan gyur pa //
translated: When there is light,

original: de tshe rang bzhin de dag kun //
analyzed: de tshe rang bzhin de dag kun //
translated: then all those natures

original: cig car ram ni rim gyis 'byung //
analyzed: cig car ram ni rim gyis 'byung //
translated: arise simultaneously or in sequence.

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: This is what is said.

original: bsam pa ni 'di yin no //
analyzed: bsam pa ni 'di yin no //
translated: The idea is as follows.

original: rlung de nyid rnam par shes pa'i bzhon pa nyid du gyur nas snang ba ste bde ba dang sdug bsngal dang / btang snyoms kyi bdag nyid du yul ji lta ji ltar snang ba dang ldan zhing gzugs brnyan shar bar gyur pa de'i tshe rang bzhin de lta bu'i sems las byung ba'i chos rnams 'byung zhing skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rlung de nyid rnam par shes pa'i bzhon pa nyid du gyur nas snang ba ste bde ba dang sdug bsngal dang / btang snyoms kyi bdag nyid du yul ji lta ji ltar snang ba dang ldan zhing gzugs brnyan shar bar gyur pa de'i tshe rang bzhin de lta bu'i sems las byung ba'i chos rnams 'byung zhing skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: When this wind becomes the mount of consciousness, it is called “appearance,” because it is endowed with the appearance of objects that are the nature of pleasure, pain, and indifference, and it is the arising of the reflection. At that time, mental factors arise and are born from the mind that has that nature.

original: ji ltar zhe na /🔽cig car ram ni rim gyis te ;
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na / cig car ram ni rim gyis te ;
translated: How?🔽Simultaneously or in sequence.

original: / dus gcig tu'am rim gyis so //
analyzed: / dus gcig tu'am rim gyis so //
translated: They arise either simultaneously or in sequence.

original: sems las byung ba rnams ni rim gyis 'byung bar gyur pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: sems las byung ba rnams ni rim gyis 'byung bar gyur pa ma yin nam /
translated: Don’t mental factors arise in sequence?

original: ji ltar cig car 'byung bar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar cig car 'byung bar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: How can they arise simultaneously?

original: gtso bo dang gtso bo ma yin pa'i sgo nas yin no zhes smra ste /
analyzed: gtso bo dang gtso bo ma yin pa'i sgo nas yin no zhes smra ste /
translated: They arise simultaneously from the primary mind and the secondary mind.

original: rol cha mang po tshogs pa'i sgra bzhin no //🔽de bzhin du khanda la sogs @93a * //
analyzed: rol cha mang po tshogs pa'i sgra bzhin no // de bzhin du khanda la sogs @93a * //
translated: They are like the sound of many instruments playing together.

original: pa dngos po rnam pa sna tshogs pa myong bar byed pa'i tshe /
analyzed: pa dngos po rnam pa sna tshogs pa myong bar byed pa'i tshe /
translated: In the same way, when the various things such as sugar are experienced,🔽the various tastes such as sweetness are experienced simultaneously.

original: bdag nyid kyis so sor rig par bya ba'i ro'i bye brag khyad par du 'phags pa kho na nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du don nyams su myong ba'i tshe yang sems las byung ba'i skad cig khyad par can rnams kho na 'byung bar 'gyur ro
analyzed: bdag nyid kyis so sor rig par bya ba'i ro'i bye brag khyad par du 'phags pa kho na nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du don nyams su myong ba'i tshe yang sems las byung ba'i skad cig khyad par can rnams kho na 'byung bar 'gyur ro
translated: Just as one experiences only the special taste that is to be individually cognized by oneself, so also when one experiences the object, only the special moments of mental factors arise.

original: // de'i phyir cig car yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni sems las byung ba rnams skye ba'i tshul yin te spyi'i don to //
analyzed: // de'i phyir cig car yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni sems las byung ba rnams skye ba'i tshul yin te spyi'i don to //
translated: Therefore, they arise simultaneously. This is the way in which mental factors arise. This is the general meaning.

original: da ni rlung g-yo ba'i sgo nas rang bzhin gyis dbye ba /
analyzed: da ni rlung g-yo ba'i sgo nas rang bzhin gyis dbye ba /
translated: Now, the natural divisions by way of the movement of the winds.

original: rlung gi gang dang gar gnas pa //
analyzed: rlung gi gang dang gar gnas pa //
translated: Whatever the wind abides in,

original: rang bzhin de dang de skyed byed //
analyzed: rang bzhin de dang de skyed byed //
translated: that nature it produces.

original: ji srid rlung gis ma bskyod pa'i ;
analyzed: ji srid rlung gis ma bskyod pa'i ;
translated: As long as the wind does not move,

original: / snang ba mi g-yor ma gyur pa //
analyzed: / snang ba mi g-yor ma gyur pa //
translated: the appearance does not move.

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te don ni 'di yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te don ni 'di yin no //
translated: This is the meaning.

original: re zhig rlung ni rnam pa lnga dang rnam pa bcu yin par sngar bshad cing de'i gnas snying ga la sogs pa'i gnas rnams dang las kyi bye brag kyang bstan mod kyi 'on kyang rang gi ngo bo dpyad na chos kyi dbyings kyi 'khor lo 'od gsal ba
analyzed: re zhig rlung ni rnam pa lnga dang rnam pa bcu yin par sngar bshad cing de'i gnas snying ga la sogs pa'i gnas rnams dang las kyi bye brag kyang bstan mod kyi 'on kyang rang gi ngo bo dpyad na chos kyi dbyings kyi 'khor lo 'od gsal ba
translated: The five and ten aspects of the wind have been explained above, and the locations of its abodes, such as the heart, and the particulars of its functions have been taught.

original: las rlung byung ste /
analyzed: las rlung byung ste /
translated: However, when its essence is analyzed, the wind arises from the wheel of the realm of phenomena, the clear light.

original: de'i phyir g-yon dang g-yas dang bar ma'i rtsa gsum ni lam yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir g-yon dang g-yas dang bar ma'i rtsa gsum ni lam yin no //
translated: Therefore, the three channels, left, right, and middle, are the path.

original: de bas na gang dang gang du ste g-yon ma g-yas sam dbus su rlung gnas pa ni rang bzhin de dang de ste sems las byung ba'i chos de de lta bu skyed par byed cing 'byung bar byed do //
analyzed: de bas na gang dang gang du ste g-yon ma g-yas sam dbus su rlung gnas pa ni rang bzhin de dang de ste sems las byung ba'i chos de de lta bu skyed par byed cing 'byung bar byed do //
translated: Thus, wherever the wind abides, to the left, right, or in the middle, it generates and produces that nature, that phenomenon that arises from the mind.

original: de bzhin du yang rtsa g-yon pa'i lam nas byung ba'i rlung gis shes rab kyi ngo bo'i rang bzhin rnams skyed par byed do //
analyzed: de bzhin du yang rtsa g-yon pa'i lam nas byung ba'i rlung gis shes rab kyi ngo bo'i rang bzhin rnams skyed par byed do //
translated: In the same way, the wind that arises through the path of the left channel generates those that have the nature of wisdom.

original: g-yas na gnas pas ni thabs kyi ngo bo rnams so //
analyzed: g-yas na gnas pas ni thabs kyi ngo bo rnams so //
translated: Those that abide in the right generate those that have the nature of method.

original: dbus na gnas pa ni ma rig pa'i ngo bo rnams skyed par byed mod kyi 'on kyang dmigs pa la ltos dgos te /
analyzed: dbus na gnas pa ni ma rig pa'i ngo bo rnams skyed par byed mod kyi 'on kyang dmigs pa la ltos dgos te /
translated: Although the ones that abide in the middle generate the natures of ignorance, nevertheless, they must rely on an object.

original: de'i phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: de'i phyir gsungs pa /
translated: Therefore, it is said:

original: ji srid snang ba ste yul 'dzin pa las 'dra ba'i rnam pa can du gyur pa'i rnam par shes pa de mi g-yo zhing brtan par ma gyur pa de srid du rlung gis bskyod pa ste bzhon pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis bskul bar bya ba yin pas na
analyzed: ji srid snang ba ste yul 'dzin pa las 'dra ba'i rnam pa can du gyur pa'i rnam par shes pa de mi g-yo zhing brtan par ma gyur pa de srid du rlung gis bskyod pa ste bzhon pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis bskul bar bya ba yin pas na
translated: As long as the consciousness that has a similar aspect to the appearance, i.e., the apprehension of the object, does not move and does not become stable, for that long, since it is to be impelled by the nature of the mount, i.e., the vāyu that moves it,

original: rlung gis bskyod pa ni rnam par shes pa rgyu ba ste mi 'byung zhing mi skye'o //
analyzed: rlung gis bskyod pa ni rnam par shes pa rgyu ba ste mi 'byung zhing mi skye'o //
translated: the movement of the vāyu does not occur, i.e., the consciousness does not arise.

original: de ltar rtsa'i bye brag dang rjes su mthun pa'i yul 'dzin pa las rang bzhin rnams 'byung ngo zhes bya ba de ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: de ltar rtsa'i bye brag dang rjes su mthun pa'i yul 'dzin pa las rang bzhin rnams 'byung ngo zhes bya ba de ni bshad zin to //
translated: As such, the arising of the natures from the apprehension of the object that corresponds to the different nāḍīs has been explained.

original: spyi'i don to //
analyzed: spyi'i don to //
translated: The general meaning.

original: da ni 'gog pa snang ba gnyis kyi rgyu can te //
analyzed: da ni 'gog pa snang ba gnyis kyi rgyu can te //
translated: Now, the cause of the appearance of cessation is as follows:

original: bdag gi dngos po rnam par brtag / gnyi ga'i yan @93b lag can nyid kyi //
analyzed: bdag gi dngos po rnam par brtag / gnyi ga'i yan @93b lag can nyid kyi //
translated: The imagined entity of both

original: snang ba nye bar thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: snang ba nye bar thob par 'gyur //
translated: The appearance is attained.

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Thus it is said.

original: snang ba gnyis te /
analyzed: snang ba gnyis te /
translated: The appearance is twofold:

original: rang bzhin rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dgag pa'i don du /
analyzed: rang bzhin rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dgag pa'i don du /
translated: the natural and the consciousness.🔽For the purpose of stopping the two, one should cultivate the stopping of the appearance that is preceded by the insertion of the two, O and A, into the vowels and consonants, and which is similar to the light rays of the moon and sun.

original: aom dang a'a:gnyis rjes su 'jug pa'i dbyangs dang tsheg drag la gzhug pa sngon du 'gro ba can gyi zla ba dang nyi ma'i 'od zer dang mtshungs pa'i snang ba mthong ba de'i rgyu can dag gi dngos po ste 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa dang nyon mongs🔽pa can gyi yid kyi rnam par shes pa rnams par brtag pa ni 'gog pa bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: aom dang a'a:gnyis rjes su 'jug pa'i dbyangs dang tsheg drag la gzhug pa sngon du 'gro ba can gyi zla ba dang nyi ma'i 'od zer dang mtshungs pa'i snang ba mthong ba de'i rgyu can dag gi dngos po ste 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa dang nyon mongs pa can gyi yid kyi rnam par shes pa rnams par brtag pa ni 'gog pa bsgom par bya'o //
translated: The entity of that is the engagement consciousness and the afflicted consciousness.

original: de'i rjes la gnyi ga'i yan lag can te snang pa gnyis su mthong ba dang bral nas ro gcig tu gyur pa mtshams kyi snang ba lta bur mthong ba'i snang ba nye bar thob pa kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa gyur pa'i mtshan nyid kyi ye shes rnal
analyzed: de'i rjes la gnyi ga'i yan lag can te snang pa gnyis su mthong ba dang bral nas ro gcig tu gyur pa mtshams kyi snang ba lta bur mthong ba'i snang ba nye bar thob pa kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa gyur pa'i mtshan nyid kyi ye shes rnal
translated: After that, one should cultivate the stopping of the appearance that is the sign of the transformation of the consciousness of the ground of all, which is the attainment of the appearance that is the single taste of the appearance that is free from the appearance of the two branches, which is like the appearance of the horizon.🔽The wisdom that has the characteristic of the transformation of the consciousness of the ground of all is the appearance that is attained.

original: 'byor pa las skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni 'gog pa'i rim pa ste sbas pa'o //
analyzed: 'byor pa las skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni 'gog pa'i rim pa ste sbas pa'o //
translated: The statement arises from the perfection of wealth is the sequence of cessation, which is the hidden meaning.

original: de ltar sngags kyi rim pa bstan nas phyag rgya'i rim pa ni /
analyzed: de ltar sngags kyi rim pa bstan nas phyag rgya'i rim pa ni /
translated: Having thus taught the sequence of mantra, the sequence of the seal is taught:

original: sgyu ma dag ni thams cad las ;
analyzed: sgyu ma dag ni thams cad las ;
translated: Among all illusions,

original: / bud med sgyu ma khyad par 'phags //
analyzed: / bud med sgyu ma khyad par 'phags //
translated: the illusion of a woman is supreme.

original: ye shes gsum gyi dbye ba 'di //
analyzed: ye shes gsum gyi dbye ba 'di //
translated: This division of the three intuitions

original: gsal bar de las mtshon par 'gyur //🔽zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: gsal bar de las mtshon par 'gyur // zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: is clearly indicated by that.

original: sgyu ma dag ni thams cad las te mig 'phrul mkhan dang sman dang nor bu dang / sngags la sogs pa las byung ba rnams kyi nang nas bud med sgyu ma ste phyag rgya byas pa'i sgyu ma khyad par 'phags pa ni khyad par can gyi gnas skabs su gyur pa'o //
analyzed: sgyu ma dag ni thams cad las te mig 'phrul mkhan dang sman dang nor bu dang / sngags la sogs pa las byung ba rnams kyi nang nas bud med sgyu ma ste phyag rgya byas pa'i sgyu ma khyad par 'phags pa ni khyad par can gyi gnas skabs su gyur pa'o //
translated: Among all illusions, those that arise from magicians, herbs, jewels, spells, and so on, the illusion of a woman, the seal that is made, is supreme, is the most special, the most excellent.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'di ltar phyag rgya de la brten nas snang ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi dga' ba dang mchog dang bral ba'i bdag nyid kyi ye shes gsum gyi dbye ba gsal bar byas nas mtshon par 'gyur zhing nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di ltar phyag rgya de la brten nas snang ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi dga' ba dang mchog dang bral ba'i bdag nyid kyi ye shes gsum gyi dbye ba gsal bar byas nas mtshon par 'gyur zhing nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, based on that seal, the three kinds of intuition, which have the nature of the joy of the characteristics of appearance, and so on, are made manifest and experienced, having been distinguished.

original: de bzhin du yang rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i skad cig gi dus su ni snang ba gsal ba'i rang bzhin gyi mchog go //
analyzed: de bzhin du yang rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i skad cig gi dus su ni snang ba gsal ba'i rang bzhin gyi mchog go //
translated: Similarly, at the time of the moment of variety, there is the supreme, which has the nature of the appearance of clarity.

original: rnam par smin pa'i skad cig gi dus su ni snang ba nye bar thob pa'i rang bzhin gyis bral ba ste sbas pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par smin pa'i skad cig gi dus su ni snang ba nye bar thob pa'i rang bzhin gyis bral ba ste sbas pa'o //
translated: At the time of the moment of maturation, there is the hidden, which has the nature of the appearance of attainment.

original: da ni de nyid rgyas par byed de /
analyzed: da ni de nyid rgyas par byed de /
translated: Now, that is elaborated.

original: 'dod chags nyid dang chags bral dang // de dag bar na gnas pa ni //
analyzed: 'dod chags nyid dang chags bral dang // de dag bar na gnas pa ni //
translated: Attachment, detachment, and the state between them

original: dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyor ba'i //
analyzed: dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyor ba'i //
translated: are from the union of the two organs

original: rdo rje padma 'dus las so //
analyzed: rdo rje padma 'dus las so //
translated: in the gathering of the vajra and lotus.

original: 'dod chags ni snang ba ste dga' ba'o //
analyzed: 'dod chags ni snang ba ste dga' ba'o //
translated: Attachment is appearance, which is joy.

original: 'dod chags dang bral ba ni snang ba nye bar thob pa ste bral ba'o //
analyzed: 'dod chags dang bral ba ni snang ba nye bar thob pa ste bral ba'o //
translated: The third is the attainment of light, which is the separation from passion.

original: de dag par te dbus na gnas pa'i gsum pa gang @94a * //
analyzed: de dag par te dbus na gnas pa'i gsum pa gang @94a * //
translated: The third, which is in the middle of those two,

original: yin pa de ni snang ba gsal ba ste mchog go //
analyzed: yin pa de ni snang ba gsal ba ste mchog go //
translated: is the light of clarity, which is the supreme.

original: de rnams kyang ji ltar nyams su myong bar 'gyur zhe na rdo rje padma 'dus las so //
analyzed: de rnams kyang ji ltar nyams su myong bar 'gyur zhe na rdo rje padma 'dus las so //
translated: And how are they experienced? From the union of the vajra and lotus.

original: dbang po gnyis te thabs dang shes rab dag mnyam par sbyor zhing snyoms par 'jug pa'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: dbang po gnyis te thabs dang shes rab dag mnyam par sbyor zhing snyoms par 'jug pa'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The two organs, method and wisdom, are united in union, that is, in sexual intercourse.

original: de nas 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa la sogs pa gsum 'gag par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig ste sbas pa'o //
analyzed: de nas 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa la sogs pa gsum 'gag par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig ste sbas pa'o //
translated: Then the three, the entering consciousness and so on, cease, that is, are arrested.

original: nang gi bdag nyid can gyi thabs dang shes rab snyoms par 'jug pa ni /🔽ye shes gnyis ni mnyam sbyor ba //🔽snyoms par 'jug par rab tu bshad //
analyzed: nang gi bdag nyid can gyi thabs dang shes rab snyoms par 'jug pa ni / ye shes gnyis ni mnyam sbyor ba // snyoms par 'jug par rab tu bshad //
translated: The union of method and wisdom that is of an inner nature🔽is explained as union🔽through the union of the two exalted wisdoms.

original: ye shes gnyis ni mnyam sbyor dang // ji skad bshad pa'i bya ba yis //
analyzed: ye shes gnyis ni mnyam sbyor dang // ji skad bshad pa'i bya ba yis //
translated: Through the activity as explained

original: 'bad pas ye shes gang thob pa //
analyzed: 'bad pas ye shes gang thob pa //
translated: The wisdom that is attained through effort

original: de ni snang ba thob pa'o //
analyzed: de ni snang ba thob pa'o //
translated: is said to be the attainment of appearance.

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: This is what is said.

original: dang por phyi rol gyi phyag rgya'i rim pas ye shes gnyis te snang ba dang gsal ba gnyis kyi rang bzhin thob pa gang yin pa de dag mnyam par sbyor ba ni snyoms par 'jug par rab tu bshad cing bstan to //
analyzed: dang por phyi rol gyi phyag rgya'i rim pas ye shes gnyis te snang ba dang gsal ba gnyis kyi rang bzhin thob pa gang yin pa de dag mnyam par sbyor ba ni snyoms par 'jug par rab tu bshad cing bstan to //
translated: First, the two wisdoms—appearance and clarity—that are attained through the stage of the external consort are said to be the union, the full explanation and teaching of union.

original: 'di ltar snang ba'i ye shes ni shes rab kyi rang bzhin la snang ba gsal ba'i ye shes ni thabs kyi rang bzhin yin te /
analyzed: 'di ltar snang ba'i ye shes ni shes rab kyi rang bzhin la snang ba gsal ba'i ye shes ni thabs kyi rang bzhin yin te /
translated: Thus, the wisdom of appearance has the nature of wisdom, and the wisdom of clarity has the nature of method.

original: de dag mnyam par sbyor ba ni thabs dang shes rab snyoms par 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: de dag mnyam par sbyor ba ni thabs dang shes rab snyoms par 'jug pa'o //
translated: The union of those two is the union of method and wisdom.

original: de'i rjes la ye shes gnyis ni mnyam sbyor te //
analyzed: de'i rjes la ye shes gnyis ni mnyam sbyor te //
translated: After that, the two wisdoms are united.🔽The summary of those two

original: de dag nye bar bsdus pa dang // ji skad bshad pa'i bya ba ste //
analyzed: de dag nye bar bsdus pa dang // ji skad bshad pa'i bya ba ste //
translated: and the activity as it is explained🔽are the wisdom of the great joy of the buddhas.

original: sngags kyi rim pas sa bon la sogs pa'i spangs pa nyid dang / phyag rgya'i rim pas dga' ba gnyis spangs pa'i skad cig gis ye shes gang thob pa de ni snang ba nye bar thob pa zhes bya ba ni sbas pa'o //
analyzed: sngags kyi rim pas sa bon la sogs pa'i spangs pa nyid dang / phyag rgya'i rim pas dga' ba gnyis spangs pa'i skad cig gis ye shes gang thob pa de ni snang ba nye bar thob pa zhes bya ba ni sbas pa'o //
translated: By the stage of mantra, the seed and so forth are abandoned, and by the stage of seal, the two joys are abandoned. The instant that wisdom is attained is called “the attainment of light,” which is hidden.

original: phyag rgya med na thabs gang la //
analyzed: phyag rgya med na thabs gang la //
translated: What is the method if there is no seal?

original: gang la chu skyes rdo rje sbyor //
analyzed: gang la chu skyes rdo rje sbyor //
translated: What is the union of lotus and vajra?

original: kun rdzob tu yang med gyur na //🔽la na cig tsam zhig myong nas kyang //
analyzed: kun rdzob tu yang med gyur na // la na cig tsam zhig myong nas kyang //
translated: If it does not exist even conventionally,

original: rnal 'byor stobs kyis 'grub par 'gyur //
analyzed: rnal 'byor stobs kyis 'grub par 'gyur //
translated: then the yogi will attain it by the power of yoga,

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: having experienced it just once.

original: rnal 'byor pa gang la rigs dang rjes su mthun pa'i phyag rgya khyad par can dang lhan cig rdo rje dang padma mnyam par sbyor ba kun rdzob tu ste grags pa med par gyur cing yod pa ma yin na de la thabs ci yod ce na /
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa gang la rigs dang rjes su mthun pa'i phyag rgya khyad par can dang lhan cig rdo rje dang padma mnyam par sbyor ba kun rdzob tu ste grags pa med par gyur cing yod pa ma yin na de la thabs ci yod ce na /
translated: If the special seal who is in accord with the family of the yogi does not exist, is not present, even conventionally, that is, even in terms of what is renowned, then what is the method?

original: rnal 'byor stobs kyis zhes bya ba rnal 'byor te ting nge 'dzin des bskyed pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang lhan cig snyoms par 'jug par bya zhing /
analyzed: rnal 'byor stobs kyis zhes bya ba rnal 'byor te ting nge 'dzin des bskyed pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang lhan cig snyoms par 'jug par bya zhing /
translated: “By the power of yoga” means that one should enter into union with the gnosis consort generated by that yoga, that is, by that meditative stabilization.

original: de'i stobs kyis te mthus snang ba la sogs pa'i ye shes gsum mtshon bar @94b bya'o ;🔽/ gal te rang dga'i rnam par rtog pa bzhin du tshad ma ma yin par gyur ba'i rang gi rnam par rtog pas brtags pa ste /
analyzed: de'i stobs kyis te mthus snang ba la sogs pa'i ye shes gsum mtshon bar @94b bya'o ; / gal te rang dga'i rnam par rtog pa bzhin du tshad ma ma yin par gyur ba'i rang gi rnam par rtog pas brtags pa ste /
translated: By the power of that, that is, by the force of that, one should illustrate the three gnoses of appearance and so forth.

original: de kho na nyid yin par ji ltar 'gyur ba ma yin nam zhen de ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de kho na nyid yin par ji ltar 'gyur ba ma yin nam zhen de ni ma yin te /
translated: If it is said: “It is not the suchness of reality because it is a conceptual imputation by one’s own conceptual thought, just like a conceptual thought of one’s choice, which is not a valid cognition,” then that is not so.

original: ji ltar lan cig ste 'od zer gcig shes rab ye shes kyi dbang gi dus nyams su myong zhing dpe'i sgo nas mtshon pa'i bde ba chen po gang yin pa de nyid rnal 'byor bas ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang lhan cig snyoms par 'jug pas kyang dpe🔽las byung ba'i rang bzhin du mtshon par bya'o //
analyzed: ji ltar lan cig ste 'od zer gcig shes rab ye shes kyi dbang gi dus nyams su myong zhing dpe'i sgo nas mtshon pa'i bde ba chen po gang yin pa de nyid rnal 'byor bas ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang lhan cig snyoms par 'jug pas kyang dpe🔽las byung ba'i rang bzhin du mtshon par bya'o //
translated: Just as one experiences the great bliss that is illustrated by the example of the single ray of light at the time of the gnosis of the wisdom consort empowerment, that very great bliss is illustrated by the example of the nature of the example🔽at the time of the fourth empowerment, when the yogi/nī enters into union with the gnosis consort.

original: sngo nyams su myong ba'i yul dran pa las don med pa'i yul can nyid yin pa'i phyir tshad ma ma yin par dogs par bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: sngo nyams su myong ba'i yul dran pa las don med pa'i yul can nyid yin pa'i phyir tshad ma ma yin par dogs par bya ba ma yin te /
translated: Because it is the subjective aspect that experiences the blue, it is not to be doubted as being non-valid cognition, since it is the intrinsic nature of the subjective aspect to experience the object.

original: rang gi ngang gis 'jug pa'i de kho na nyid ni de kho na'i tshul du mthong ba'i phyir chu'i rgyun gyi rgyun chags pa bzhin no //
analyzed: rang gi ngang gis 'jug pa'i de kho na nyid ni de kho na'i tshul du mthong ba'i phyir chu'i rgyun gyi rgyun chags pa bzhin no //
