original: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i snying por gyur pa'i rim pa lnga'i man ngag bstan zhing rnam par bshad par 'os pa yin zhing snod du rung ba yin te /
analyzed: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i snying por gyur pa'i rim pa lnga'i man ngag bstan zhing rnam par bshad par 'os pa yin zhing snod du rung ba yin te /
translated: It is suitable to teach and explain the intimate instruction of the five stages that are the essence of the glorious Guhyasamāja Tantra, and it is suitable to be a vessel.

original: de la bla mas man ngag bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: de la bla mas man ngag bstan par bya'o //
translated: The guru should teach the intimate instruction to that person.

original: yang na de ni gzhan rnams la rgyud kyi rgyal po rnam par 'chad par 'os pa yin te /
analyzed: yang na de ni gzhan rnams la rgyud kyi rgyal po rnam par 'chad par 'os pa yin te /
translated: Or, it is suitable to explain the king of tantras to others

original: rig pa dang ldan pa nyid dang mi slu ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rig pa dang ldan pa nyid dang mi slu ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is endowed with knowledge and is nondeceptive.

original: de bas na de ni rang dang gzhan gyi don bsgrub par nus pa yin par shes par bya ste sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
analyzed: de bas na de ni rang dang gzhan gyi don bsgrub par nus pa yin par shes par bya ste sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
translated: Therefore, it should be understood that one is able to accomplish one’s own and others’ goals.

original: da ni rim pa'i mtha' mar yongs su bsngo ba /
analyzed: da ni rim pa'i mtha' mar yongs su bsngo ba /
translated: Now, the conclusion of the stages is the dedication:

original: 'phags pa rdo rje drin gyi rgyud rnams rab tu mang thos pa //
analyzed: 'phags pa rdo rje drin gyi rgyud rnams rab tu mang thos pa //
translated: Having heard the many tantras of the vajra guru,

original: gsal bar rnam par bkod pa'i tshig gis byang chub lam ni rnam phye ba //
analyzed: gsal bar rnam par bkod pa'i tshig gis byang chub lam ni rnam phye ba //
translated: the path of awakening is explained with clear, well-ordered words.

original: sh'akya'i bshes gnyen gyis ni dge ba bsags pa gang yin des ;
analyzed: sh'akya'i bshes gnyen gyis ni dge ba bsags pa gang yin des ;
translated: By whatever virtue is accumulated by the Śākya friend,

original: / gsal la myur du rnam par smin nas byang chub snod gyur shog / ces pa gsungs te /
analyzed: / gsal la myur du rnam par smin nas byang chub snod gyur shog / ces pa gsungs te /
translated: May it be clear and quickly ripened, and may I become a vessel for enlightenment.

original: 'phags pa rdo rje sgra gcan 'dzin bzang po'i zhal snga nas kyi sku drin gyis rgyud shin tu mang po thob pa'i sh'akya bshes gnyen bdag gis gsal zhing the tshom med par byas nas tshig gi phreng bas rnam par bkod pa'i @113a * //
analyzed: 'phags pa rdo rje sgra gcan 'dzin bzang po'i zhal snga nas kyi sku drin gyis rgyud shin tu mang po thob pa'i sh'akya bshes gnyen bdag gis gsal zhing the tshom med par byas nas tshig gi phreng bas rnam par bkod pa'i @113a * //
translated: I, Shakya Guna, having obtained many tantras through the kindness of the noble Vajra Rahulabhadra, have made this clear and free of doubt, and have arranged it in a garland of words.

original: sems rnam par dag pa'i rim pa'i byang chub kyi lam de mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang gnyen po'i phyogs kyi ngo bo nyid kyis gsal bar byas shing rnam par phye ba las dge ba mtho zhing bsod nams thob pa gang yin pa'i dge ba des gsal ba ste
analyzed: sems rnam par dag pa'i rim pa'i byang chub kyi lam de mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang gnyen po'i phyogs kyi ngo bo nyid kyis gsal bar byas shing rnam par phye ba las dge ba mtho zhing bsod nams thob pa gang yin pa'i dge ba des gsal ba ste
translated: The stages of the mind's purification, the path to enlightenment, have been clarified and analyzed by me through the nature of the antidotes to the discordant factors. Whatever virtue has been obtained through this high virtue, by that virtue, may it be clear,🔽that is, may it be obtained without doubt and quickly.

original: the tshom med cing dus myur bar thob par 'gyur ba'i rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: the tshom med cing dus myur bar thob par 'gyur ba'i rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu gang yin pa'o //
translated: This is the fruitional effect.

original: 'bras bu de las sems can rnams byang chub snod de sems rnams par dag pa'i rim pas thob par bya ba mngon par byang chub pa thob par gyur cig ces bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'bras bu de las sems can rnams byang chub snod de sems rnams par dag pa'i rim pas thob par bya ba mngon par byang chub pa thob par gyur cig ces bya ba'i don to //
translated: The result of that is the attainment of the enlightenment of sentient beings, that is, the attainment of the enlightenment of the stages of the purification of the mind.

original: de ni sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
analyzed: de ni sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
translated: This is the literal meaning.

original: 'dir sh'akya bshes gnyen zhes bya ba ni klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas kyis rab tu byung ba'i mtshan yin la /
analyzed: 'dir sh'akya bshes gnyen zhes bya ba ni klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas kyis rab tu byung ba'i mtshan yin la /
translated: Here, Shakya Mitra is the name of Nagarjuna when he was a monk.

original: grags pa'i mtshan ni 'phags pa klu sgrub ces bya ba yin no //
analyzed: grags pa'i mtshan ni 'phags pa klu sgrub ces bya ba yin no //
translated: His famous name is Arya Nagarjuna.🔽Moreover, because Master Shakya Mitra was his disciple, he out of affection for him inserted his name in the middle of the treatise.

original: yang slob dpon sh'akya bshes gnyen ni de'i slob ma yin pa'i phyir de la brtse ba'i sgo nas rab tu byed pa'i nang du de'i ming bcug pa kho na yin te 'di ltar bla ma brtse ba dang ldan pa rnams ni bstan bcos bdag nyid kyis byas kyang
analyzed: yang slob dpon sh'akya bshes gnyen ni de'i slob ma yin pa'i phyir de la brtse ba'i sgo nas rab tu byed pa'i nang du de'i ming bcug pa kho na yin te 'di ltar bla ma brtse ba dang ldan pa rnams ni bstan bcos bdag nyid kyis byas kyang
translated: Thus, it is the custom that loving teachers, even though they compose treatises themselves,

original: slob mas byas so zhes smra ba ni lugs yin no //
analyzed: slob mas byas so zhes smra ba ni lugs yin no //
translated: say that their disciples composed them.

original: bsod nams bsngo ba ni zhabs su bya ba yin mod kyi /
analyzed: bsod nams bsngo ba ni zhabs su bya ba yin mod kyi /
translated: The dedication of merit is the conclusion.

original: 'dir bya ba ni rim pa dka' ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dir bya ba ni rim pa dka' ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Here, the process is difficult, because of the difficulty of the process.

original: dka' ba nyid ni sems las sbyang dka' ba gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dka' ba nyid ni sems las sbyang dka' ba gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The difficulty is because there is no other mind training than this.

original: rim pa lnga'i bshad pa nor bu'i phreng ba las sems rnam par dag ba'i rim pa ste gnyis pa'o /
analyzed: rim pa lnga'i bshad pa nor bu'i phreng ba las sems rnam par dag ba'i rim pa ste gnyis pa'o /
translated: This concludes the second chapter, on the process of purifying the mind, in the Ornament of Rangjung, a commentary on the Five Stages.

original: // / da ni bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa brtsam pa phyag 'tshal ba /
analyzed: // / da ni bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa brtsam pa phyag 'tshal ba /
translated: Now, the process of self-consecration is begun with the homage:

original: rdo rje kun gyi dang po gtso //
analyzed: rdo rje kun gyi dang po gtso //
translated: Homage to the first of all vajras,

original: rdo rje che la phyag 'tshal nas //🔽bdag byin brlab pa'i rim pa 'di //
analyzed: rdo rje che la phyag 'tshal nas // bdag byin brlab pa'i rim pa 'di //
translated: having paid homage to the great vajra,🔽I will explain this process of self-consecration

original: brtse bas bdag gis bshad par bya //🔽zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: brtse bas bdag gis bshad par bya // zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: out of love for myself.

original: rdo rje che ni ye shes lnga yin te de dag gcig pa nyid du gyur pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir rdo rje che ste drug pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje che ni ye shes lnga yin te de dag gcig pa nyid du gyur pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir rdo rje che ste drug pa'o //
translated: The great vajra is the five intuitions, and the sixth, the great vajra, is the essence of their unity.

original: de nyid kyi phyir rdo rje kun gyi ste de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i skyed par byed pa nyid yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir rdo rje kun gyi ste de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i skyed par byed pa nyid yin pa'i phyir /
translated: For that very reason, it is the first of all vajras, because it is the producer of the five transcendent lords.

original: dang po yang yin la bdag po nyid yin pa'i phyir gtso bo yang yin pas rdo rje kun gyi dang po gtso bo ste rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
analyzed: dang po yang yin la bdag po nyid yin pa'i phyir gtso bo yang yin pas rdo rje kun gyi dang po gtso bo ste rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
translated: Since it is the first and also the lord, it is the chief, therefore it is the first of all vajras, the Great Vajradhara.

original: phyag 'tshal nas te phyag byas nas sngar don rnam par phye ba'i bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa ste sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rim pa /
analyzed: phyag 'tshal nas te phyag byas nas sngar don rnam par phye ba'i bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa ste sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rim pa /
translated: Having bowed to that, having paid homage to that, I will explain the stage of self-consecration, the stage of illusion-like concentration, which was previously analyzed.

original: bdag gis te slob ma rjes su gzung pa'i blo yis bshad par bya'o zhes bya @113b ba ni yi ge'i don to //
analyzed: bdag gis te slob ma rjes su gzung pa'i blo yis bshad par bya'o zhes bya @113b ba ni yi ge'i don to //
translated: I, with the mind of accepting disciples, will explain. This is the word-meaning.

original: yang na rdo rje zhes bya ba ni chos kyi dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma zhes bya ba'i rtsa ste bha ga'i dbus na rab tu gnas pa'o //
analyzed: yang na rdo rje zhes bya ba ni chos kyi dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma zhes bya ba'i rtsa ste bha ga'i dbus na rab tu gnas pa'o //
translated: Or else, the vajra is the channel called the mistress of the realm of phenomena, located in the center of the bhaga.

original: de yang ji lta bu zhe na de nyid las thams cad 'byung ba'i phyir rdo rje kun gyi ste rtsa sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi dang por gyur pa yang yin la /
analyzed: de yang ji lta bu zhe na de nyid las thams cad 'byung ba'i phyir rdo rje kun gyi ste rtsa sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi dang por gyur pa yang yin la /
translated: And what is it like? Since everything arises from it, it is the first of all vajras, the first of the thirty-two channels.

original: bde ba chen po'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir gtso bo yang yin no //
analyzed: bde ba chen po'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir gtso bo yang yin no //
translated: It is also the principal one because it is the nature of great bliss.

original: de'i rang bzhin gyi byang chub kyi sems rdo rje 'chang la phyag 'tshal nas bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa bshad par bya'o zhes bya ba ni spyi'i don to //
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin gyi byang chub kyi sems rdo rje 'chang la phyag 'tshal nas bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa bshad par bya'o zhes bya ba ni spyi'i don to //
translated: Having paid homage to Vajradhara, the nature of the bodhicitta, I will explain the stage of self-consecration. This is the general meaning.

original: rdo rje bdud rtsi las kyang /
analyzed: rdo rje bdud rtsi las kyang /
translated: Also, in the Vajra Amṛta Tantra:

original: bha ga yi ni dbus gnas pa //
analyzed: bha ga yi ni dbus gnas pa //
translated: In the center of the bhaga

original: myos byed 'dzag pa'i rtsa gang yin //🔽de ni rtsa gzhan sum cu gnyis //
analyzed: myos byed 'dzag pa'i rtsa gang yin // de ni rtsa gzhan sum cu gnyis //
translated: is the channel of dripping intoxicant.🔽That is the principal one

original: de rnams nang nas gtso bo yin //
analyzed: de rnams nang nas gtso bo yin //
translated: among the thirty-two channels.

original: gzhes kyang gsungs so //
analyzed: gzhes kyang gsungs so //
translated: It is also stated in the Vajra Tent Tantra:🔽The great vajra is the three:

original: rdo rje che ni 'dod chags dang bral ba dang 'dod chags bar ma zhes bya ba gsum po ste /
analyzed: rdo rje che ni 'dod chags dang bral ba dang 'dod chags bar ma zhes bya ba gsum po ste /
translated: free from attachment, attachment, and so on.

original: de rnams kyi rdo rje kun ni thams cad stong pa'i rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i de kho na nyid do //
analyzed: de rnams kyi rdo rje kun ni thams cad stong pa'i rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i de kho na nyid do //
translated: The vajra of all of them is the reality of clear light by the nature of all emptiness.

original: de nyid thams cad kyi gcig tu gyur pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir dang po yin zhing 'jigs pa med pa'i lhan cig skyes pa'i phyir ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir gtso bo'o //
analyzed: de nyid thams cad kyi gcig tu gyur pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir dang po yin zhing 'jigs pa med pa'i lhan cig skyes pa'i phyir ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir gtso bo'o //
translated: It is the first because it is the nature of the one of all those, and it is the principal one because it is the nature of the fearless connate.

original: de la phyag 'tshal nas te nyams su myong bar byas nas snga ma bzhin du bshad par bya'o zhes bya ba ni sbas pa'o //
analyzed: de la phyag 'tshal nas te nyams su myong bar byas nas snga ma bzhin du bshad par bya'o zhes bya ba ni sbas pa'o //
translated: Having bowed to that, having experienced it, one should explain as before. This is the hidden meaning.

original: de bzhin du rdo rje che ni mi phyed pa nyid yin pa'i phyir 'od gsal ba'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du rdo rje che ni mi phyed pa nyid yin pa'i phyir 'od gsal ba'o //
translated: Similarly, the great vajra is the clear light because it is indivisible.

original: de las langs nas dkyil 'khor pa rdo rje kun gyi dang po ste sgyu ma lta bu dang / gtso bo ste dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po ye shes kyi sku de la phyag 'tshal nas te brtan nas bshad par bya'o zhes bya ba yang sbas pa yin no //
analyzed: de las langs nas dkyil 'khor pa rdo rje kun gyi dang po ste sgyu ma lta bu dang / gtso bo ste dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po ye shes kyi sku de la phyag 'tshal nas te brtan nas bshad par bya'o zhes bya ba yang sbas pa yin no //
translated: Having arisen from that, one should explain having bowed to, having stabilized, the first of all vajras, the illusory body, and the principal one, the lord of the mandala, the gnosis body. This also is the hidden meaning.

original: yang na thams cad la khyab par byed pa nyid yin pa'i phyir chen po yin la gzhag par mi nus pa nyid yin pa'i phyir rdo rje yin pas rnam par shes pa gsum ni rdo rje che'o //
analyzed: yang na thams cad la khyab par byed pa nyid yin pa'i phyir chen po yin la gzhag par mi nus pa nyid yin pa'i phyir rdo rje yin pas rnam par shes pa gsum ni rdo rje che'o //
translated: The three consciousnesses are the great vajra.

original: rdo rje kun ni rang bzhin rnams so //
analyzed: rdo rje kun ni rang bzhin rnams so //
translated: All vajras are the natures.

original: de rnams spong ba'i phyir dang po yin zhing /
analyzed: de rnams spong ba'i phyir dang po yin zhing /
translated: Because they are abandoned, it is the first.

original: blang bar bya ba nyid yin pa'i phyir gtso bo ste /
analyzed: blang bar bya ba nyid yin pa'i phyir gtso bo ste /
translated: Because it is to be taken up, it is the principal.

original: 'od gsal ba de la phyag 'tshal zhing de'i bdag nyid du zhugs nas bshad par bya'o zhes bya ba yang sbas pa'o //
analyzed: 'od gsal ba de la phyag 'tshal zhing de'i bdag nyid du zhugs nas bshad par bya'o zhes bya ba yang sbas pa'o //
translated: Having bowed to that clear light and entered into its nature, it should be explained.

original: de bzhin du rdo rje che ni bzhi pa ste lhan cig skyes pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du rdo rje che ni bzhi pa ste lhan cig skyes pa'o //
translated: In the same way, the great vajra is the fourth, which is connate.

original: rdo rje kun te smig rgyu lta bu la sogs pa mtshan ma lnga'i dang po ni mtshon par bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje kun te smig rgyu lta bu la sogs pa mtshan ma lnga'i dang po ni mtshon par bya'o //
translated: All vajras are the first sign of the mirage-like nature and so on.

original: gtso bo ste 'jig rten las 'das pa'i go 'phang thob pa'i rgyur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal nas te thob nas bshad par @114a * //
analyzed: gtso bo ste 'jig rten las 'das pa'i go 'phang thob pa'i rgyur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal nas te thob nas bshad par @114a * //
translated: Having bowed to the principal, which is the cause of attaining the supramundane stage, and having attained it, it should be explained.

original: bya'o zhes bya ba ni mthar thug pa'o //
analyzed: bya'o zhes bya ba ni mthar thug pa'o //
translated: The phrase I will explain is the conclusion.

original: yang na rdo rje che ni mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i ngo bo'o //
analyzed: yang na rdo rje che ni mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i ngo bo'o //
translated: Or else, the great vajra is the nature of non-abiding nirvana.

original: rdo rje kun te kun rdzob dang don dam pa dag tha mi dad par dbye ba'i phyir dang po yin zhing /
analyzed: rdo rje kun te kun rdzob dang don dam pa dag tha mi dad par dbye ba'i phyir dang po yin zhing /
translated: The vajra of all is the first, because the conventional and the ultimate are undifferentiated.

original: gtso bo ste mi slob pa'i lam gyis thob par bya ba'i rdo rje 'chang gi sku la phyag 'tshal nas te mngon du byas nas brtse bas sems can gyi don bya ba'i phyir bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa bshad par bya'o zhes bya ba yang mthar thug
analyzed: gtso bo ste mi slob pa'i lam gyis thob par bya ba'i rdo rje 'chang gi sku la phyag 'tshal nas te mngon du byas nas brtse bas sems can gyi don bya ba'i phyir bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa bshad par bya'o zhes bya ba yang mthar thug
translated: Having paid homage to the body of Vajradhara, which is to be attained by the path of no-more-learning, the principal one, out of compassion for the benefit of sentient beings, I will explain the stage of self-consecration.

original: pa'o // da ni bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i snod du rung ba'i slob ma'i mtshan nyid dang / de thob par bya ba'i ched du bla ma la mchod pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: pa'o // da ni bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i snod du rung ba'i slob ma'i mtshan nyid dang / de thob par bya ba'i ched du bla ma la mchod pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: Now, in order to demonstrate the characteristics of a disciple who is a suitable vessel for self-consecration and the worship of the guru for the sake of attaining that,

original: dang por re zhig bskyed pa'i rim pa'i rjes su 'brangs pas dbang bskur ba thob cing /
analyzed: dang por re zhig bskyed pa'i rim pa'i rjes su 'brangs pas dbang bskur ba thob cing /
translated: first of all, following the stage of generation, one obtains initiation.

original: rgyud rnam pa bzhi'i dgongs pa shes pa shes rab dang ldan zhing lus dang ngag dang yid rnam par dben pa'i thos pa 'dzin pa bden pa gnyis la lhag par mos pas rdo rje slob dpon yang dag par mnyes par bya ste /
analyzed: rgyud rnam pa bzhi'i dgongs pa shes pa shes rab dang ldan zhing lus dang ngag dang yid rnam par dben pa'i thos pa 'dzin pa bden pa gnyis la lhag par mos pas rdo rje slob dpon yang dag par mnyes par bya ste /
translated: one should please the vajra master.

original: de nas mnyes par gyur pa'i bla ma la tshogs kyi mchod pa chen po byas nas /
analyzed: de nas mnyes par gyur pa'i bla ma la tshogs kyi mchod pa chen po byas nas /
translated: Then, having made a great gaṇapūja offering to the guru who is pleased,🔽one should offer a sixteen-year-old great vajra master.

original: lo bcu drug pa rdo rje slob dpon chen po la phul te de'i 'og tu bla ma'i zhal nas bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa'i man ngag thob pas phreng ba dang chu dang rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang rdo rje dang dril bu sbyin pa dang /
analyzed: lo bcu drug pa rdo rje slob dpon chen po la phul te de'i 'og tu bla ma'i zhal nas bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa'i man ngag thob pas phreng ba dang chu dang rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang rdo rje dang dril bu sbyin pa dang /
translated: After that, having obtained the intimate instruction of the stage of self-consecration from the guru’s mouth, having obtained the secret empowerment, together with the gift of the rosary, water, perfect buddha, vajra, and bell,

original: me long dang ming dang slob dpon dang rjes su gnang ba rnams dang bcas par gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba thob nas bstod pa 'di rnams kyis bstod par bya'o zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: me long dang ming dang slob dpon dang rjes su gnang ba rnams dang bcas par gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba thob nas bstod pa 'di rnams kyis bstod par bya'o zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: the mirror, name, master, and permission, one should praise with these praises.

original: dang por zhes bya ba ni bdag byin gyis brlab pa gsol ba 'debs pa'i tshe'o //
analyzed: dang por zhes bya ba ni bdag byin gyis brlab pa gsol ba 'debs pa'i tshe'o //
translated: First means at the time of supplicating in the self-consecration.

original: bskyed pa'i rim pa'i rjes su 'brangs bas te mngon par byang chub pa rnam par lnga'i rim pas so //
analyzed: bskyed pa'i rim pa'i rjes su 'brangs bas te mngon par byang chub pa rnam par lnga'i rim pas so //
translated: Following the stage of generation, by the stage of the five manifest enlightenments.

original: dbang bskur ba thob pa zhes bya ba ni slob dpon gyi dbang bskur ba thob pa'o //
analyzed: dbang bskur ba thob pa zhes bya ba ni slob dpon gyi dbang bskur ba thob pa'o //
translated: Having obtained empowerment means having obtained the master empowerment.

original: rgyud rnam pa bzhi ste bya ba dang spyod pa dang rnal 'byor dang rnal 'byor mchog gi rgyud rnams kyi dgongs pa mtha' drug gi bshad pa'i rim pa dang ldan pa'i lam dang lung dang rigs pa dag gis zhes pa ni don gyis bye brag rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: rgyud rnam pa bzhi ste bya ba dang spyod pa dang rnal 'byor dang rnal 'byor mchog gi rgyud rnams kyi dgongs pa mtha' drug gi bshad pa'i rim pa dang ldan pa'i lam dang lung dang rigs pa dag gis zhes pa ni don gyis bye brag rtogs pa'o //
translated: The four kinds of tantra are the Action, Performance, Yoga, and Highest Yoga Tantras. The meaning of with the path and scripture and reasoning possessing the stage of explanation of the six limits, the purport of those tantras is understood by implication.

original: lus la sogs pa rnams kyi rnam par dben pa 'dzin pa ni ting de 'dzin gyi dbye ba shes pa'o //
analyzed: lus la sogs pa rnams kyi rnam par dben pa 'dzin pa ni ting de 'dzin gyi dbye ba shes pa'o //
translated: Grasping the isolations of body and so forth is knowing the divisions of meditative stabilization.

original: thos pa 'dzin pa ni mang du 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: thos pa 'dzin pa ni mang du 'dzin pa'o //
translated: Grasping the heard is grasping the many.

original: bden pa gnyis te zung du 'jug pa'i rim pa tha dad pa'i rim pa med pa'i de kho na nyid yongs su shes @114b par bya ba'i don du lhag par mos pa dang ldan pa'i phyir lhag par mos pa ste 'bras bu thob par bya ba'i phyir 'bad
analyzed: bden pa gnyis te zung du 'jug pa'i rim pa tha dad pa'i rim pa med pa'i de kho na nyid yongs su shes @114b par bya ba'i don du lhag par mos pa dang ldan pa'i phyir lhag par mos pa ste 'bras bu thob par bya ba'i phyir 'bad
translated: The disciple who is thus endowed with the highest aspiration, who is intent on understanding reality, which is the stage of union of the two truths, the stage that is not separate, should make effort, should strive, in order to attain the result.

original: par byed pa'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: par byed pa'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: This is the meaning.

original: de lta bu'i slob mas rdo rje slob dpon te rdo rje bla ma rgyu med cing dad pas yang dag par mnyes par byas shing lan gnyis sam gsum du gsol ba btab nas so //
analyzed: de lta bu'i slob mas rdo rje slob dpon te rdo rje bla ma rgyu med cing dad pas yang dag par mnyes par byas shing lan gnyis sam gsum du gsol ba btab nas so //
translated: Such a disciple, having pleased the vajra master, the vajra guru, with devotion without regard to cost, and having requested twice or thrice,

original: de'i rjes la des gsol ba btab pas mnyes par gyur cing slob ma la brtse ba dang bcas pa'i bla ma la 'dod pa'i longs spyod lnga gtso bor gyur pa'i tshogs kyi mchod pa chen po byas nas /
analyzed: de'i rjes la des gsol ba btab pas mnyes par gyur cing slob ma la brtse ba dang bcas pa'i bla ma la 'dod pa'i longs spyod lnga gtso bor gyur pa'i tshogs kyi mchod pa chen po byas nas /
translated: after that, having pleased him with his request, the disciple, with devotion to the guru, should make a great gaṇacakra offering, primarily of the desired five enjoyments.

original: de'i rjes la gsang ba'i mchod pa bya ba'i phyir lo bcu drug ma rigs dang rjes su mthun zhing gzugs bzang ba rgyan dang bcas shing lus dri zhim pa legs par bslab pa'i phyag rgya phul te /
analyzed: de'i rjes la gsang ba'i mchod pa bya ba'i phyir lo bcu drug ma rigs dang rjes su mthun zhing gzugs bzang ba rgyan dang bcas shing lus dri zhim pa legs par bslab pa'i phyag rgya phul te /
translated: After that, in order to make the secret offering, one should offer a consort who is sixteen years old, who is of a suitable caste, who is beautiful, who is adorned, whose body smells sweet, and who is a mudra who has been well trained.

original: de'i 'og tu zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya phul ba'i 'og rol gyi dus su'o //
analyzed: de'i 'og tu zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya phul ba'i 'og rol gyi dus su'o //
translated: After that means at the time after offering the mudra.

original: bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i rin pa thob pa zhes bya ba ni rdo rje slob dpon des de dang snyoms par 'jug pa las byung ba'i byang chub kyi sems kyi gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba thob par byas nas /
analyzed: bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i rin pa thob pa zhes bya ba ni rdo rje slob dpon des de dang snyoms par 'jug pa las byung ba'i byang chub kyi sems kyi gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba thob par byas nas /
translated: Having obtained the price of self consecration means that the vajra master has caused the student to obtain the secret empowerment of bodhicitta arising from union with her.

original: de'i rjes de la byin nas phyag rgya bzhi bsgom pa'i sgo nas shes rab kyi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur te 'od gsal ba shes par byas nas de las langs par gyur pa na /
analyzed: de'i rjes de la byin nas phyag rgya bzhi bsgom pa'i sgo nas shes rab kyi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur te 'od gsal ba shes par byas nas de las langs par gyur pa na /
translated: After that, having given her to him, he should empower him with the wisdom empowerment by means of the meditation on the four mudras, and having caused him to understand clear light, he should arise from that.

original: bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa'i man ngag thob pa yin na zhes brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa'i man ngag thob pa yin na zhes brjod par bya'o //
translated: Then he should say, “I have obtained the intimate instruction of the stage of self consecration.”

original: phreng ba zhes bya ba ni dang po dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa'i mgo la lha'i dkyil 'khor gyis byin gyis brlab par bya ba'i phyir bum pa las blangs te gzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: phreng ba zhes bya ba ni dang po dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa'i mgo la lha'i dkyil 'khor gyis byin gyis brlab par bya ba'i phyir bum pa las blangs te gzhag par bya'o //
translated: The garland is the one taken from the vase and placed on the head of the disciple who has entered the mandala for the first time, in order to consecrate him with the mandala of the deity.

original: chu la sogs pa rjes su gnang ba la thug pa'i slob dpon gyi dbang ni lus rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir yin no //
analyzed: chu la sogs pa rjes su gnang ba la thug pa'i slob dpon gyi dbang ni lus rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir yin no //
translated: The initiation of the master, up to the permission to study, etc., is for the sake of purifying the body.

original: gsang ba ni ngag rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir yin no //
analyzed: gsang ba ni ngag rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir yin no //
translated: The secret is for the sake of purifying the speech.

original: de rnams dang bcas par thob nas zhes bya ba ni shes rab kyi dbang bskur ba thob nas so //
analyzed: de rnams dang bcas par thob nas zhes bya ba ni shes rab kyi dbang bskur ba thob nas so //
translated: Having obtained all of them, i.e., having obtained the initiation of wisdom,

original: de'i rjes la shes rab ye shes kyi man ngag thob par bya ba'i ched du bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa'i man ngag gi de kho na nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir 'chad par 'gyur ba'i bstod pa'i tsheg rnams kyis bla ma ste rdo rje slob dpon
analyzed: de'i rjes la shes rab ye shes kyi man ngag thob par bya ba'i ched du bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa'i man ngag gi de kho na nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir 'chad par 'gyur ba'i bstod pa'i tsheg rnams kyis bla ma ste rdo rje slob dpon
translated: after that, for the sake of obtaining the instruction of the wisdom knowledge, for the sake of obtaining the reality of the instruction of the stage of self-consecration, with the verses of praise that will be explained, the guru, i.e., the vajra master,

original: la bstod par bya'o zhes bya ba ni spyi'i don dang spas pa'o //
analyzed: la bstod par bya'o zhes bya ba ni spyi'i don dang spas pa'o //
translated: One should praise is the general and hidden meaning.

original: da ni bstod pa /🔽khong stong khyod kyi sku la med //
analyzed: da ni bstod pa / khong stong khyod kyi sku la med //
translated: Now, the praise:🔽You have no hollow body.

original: sha dang rus pa khrag med kyang //
analyzed: sha dang rus pa khrag med kyang //
translated: You have no flesh, bones, or blood.

original: nam mkha' la ni 'ja' tshon ltar //🔽khyod kyis sku @115a * //
analyzed: nam mkha' la ni 'ja' tshon ltar // khyod kyis sku @115a * //
translated: Like a rainbow in the sky,

original: ni ston par mdzad //
analyzed: ni ston par mdzad //
translated: You display your body.

original: ces gsungs pa'i don ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: ces gsungs pa'i don ni 'di yin te /
translated: The meaning of this is as follows:

original: kye bcom ldan 'das rdo rje slob dpon khyod kyis sku la khong stong ste sgo la sogs pa'i rim gyis stong pa nyid med do //🔽de bzhin du sha dang rus pa khrag ste khams kyi rtsa rnams nye bar mtshon par byed pa de dag kyang med de /
analyzed: kye bcom ldan 'das rdo rje slob dpon khyod kyis sku la khong stong ste sgo la sogs pa'i rim gyis stong pa nyid med do // de bzhin du sha dang rus pa khrag ste khams kyi rtsa rnams nye bar mtshon par byed pa de dag kyang med de /
translated: O Bhagavān Vajra Master, your body has no hollowness, no emptiness by stages such as the door and so on.

original: dngos po thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan gyi rnam pa can gyi me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dngos po thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan gyi rnam pa can gyi me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Likewise, you have no flesh, bones, or blood, which are indicated by the channels, because you are the nature of mirror-like wisdom, which has the aspect of the reflection of all things.

original: gal te de ltar sku nyid du snang bar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: gal te de ltar sku nyid du snang bar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: If it is asked, How does it appear as a body?

original: nam mkha' la ni 'ja' tshon te /
analyzed: nam mkha' la ni 'ja' tshon te /
translated: Like a rainbow in the sky,

original: ji ltar dbang po'i gzhu kha dog lnga'i rang bzhin du 'phro ba dang gzhu lta bu'i dbyibs su med bzhin du yang snang ba de kho na bzhin du nyon mongs pa'i gti mug la sogs pa rnam par sbyong ba'i ched du zhi ba la sogs pa'i las bya
analyzed: ji ltar dbang po'i gzhu kha dog lnga'i rang bzhin du 'phro ba dang gzhu lta bu'i dbyibs su med bzhin du yang snang ba de kho na bzhin du nyon mongs pa'i gti mug la sogs pa rnam par sbyong ba'i ched du zhi ba la sogs pa'i las bya
translated: Just as the bow of Indra shines with the nature of five colors and does not exist in the shape of a bow, in the same way, for the sake of purifying the afflictions of delusion and so on, you display and stabilize your body in order to perform the functions of pacifying and so on.

original: ba'i phyir khyod kyis sku ston par mdzad cing brtan par mdzad ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: ba'i phyir khyod kyis sku ston par mdzad cing brtan par mdzad ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: This is the meaning of the verse.

original: de ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi sgo nas bstod pa yin te dgongs pa ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: de ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi sgo nas bstod pa yin te dgongs pa ma yin pa'o //
translated: This is praise from the perspective of Vairocana, not from the intended perspective.

original: sku la snyun med mi gtsang med //
analyzed: sku la snyun med mi gtsang med //
translated: Your body is free from illness and impurity,

original: bkres dang skom pa 'byung med kyang //🔽khyod ni 'jig rten mthun pa'i phyir //
analyzed: bkres dang skom pa 'byung med kyang // khyod ni 'jig rten mthun pa'i phyir //
translated: and hunger and thirst do not occur.🔽Yet, in accordance with the world,

original: 'jig rten bya ba ston par mdzad //
analyzed: 'jig rten bya ba ston par mdzad //
translated: you demonstrate worldly activities.

original: khyod kyi sku la nyon mongs pa 'dod chags dang 'brel pa'i nyon mongs pa'i snyun med cing de bzhin du lus kyi chos reg bya'i bye brag bkres pa dang skom pa la sogs pa de rnams kyang yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: khyod kyi sku la nyon mongs pa 'dod chags dang 'brel pa'i nyon mongs pa'i snyun med cing de bzhin du lus kyi chos reg bya'i bye brag bkres pa dang skom pa la sogs pa de rnams kyang yod pa ma yin te /
translated: Your body is free from the sickness of the afflictions, such as attachment, and likewise, the specific tactile objects of the body, such as hunger and thirst, do not exist.

original: so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyis 'dod chags la sogs pa thams cad rnam par sbyangs ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyis 'dod chags la sogs pa thams cad rnam par sbyangs ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because you have purified all attachment and so forth with your discerning wisdom.

original: 'on kyang 'jig rten mthun bya'i phyir dang sems can rjes su gzung bar bya ba'i phyir khyod kyis dbang du bya ba la sogs pa'i las 'jig rten gyi bya ba ngag rnam par sbyang ba dang / 'dod chags spang ba'i phyir ston par mdzad cing gsal bar mdzad do zhes bya ba ni 'od dpag tu med pa'i sgo nas bstod pa yin te dgongs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang 'jig rten mthun bya'i phyir dang sems can rjes su gzung bar bya ba'i phyir khyod kyis dbang du bya ba la sogs pa'i las 'jig rten gyi bya ba ngag rnam par sbyang ba dang / 'dod chags spang ba'i phyir ston par mdzad cing gsal bar mdzad do zhes bya ba ni 'od dpag tu med pa'i sgo nas bstod pa yin te dgongs pa ma yin no //
translated: Nevertheless, in order to conform with the world and in order to care for sentient beings, you perform worldly actions such as subjugation and so forth, in order to purify speech and abandon attachment. You do this by teaching and clarifying. This is the praise from the perspective of Amitābha, not the hidden meaning.

original: chu zla bzhin du gzung du med //
analyzed: chu zla bzhin du gzung du med //
translated: Like the moon in water, it is ungraspable.

original: chos rnams kun la gnas pa med //
analyzed: chos rnams kun la gnas pa med //
translated: It does not abide in any phenomena.

original: nga rgyal med cing rmongs mi mnga' //
analyzed: nga rgyal med cing rmongs mi mnga' //
translated: You are free of pride and ignorance,

original: dmigs med khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: dmigs med khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: You are free of conceptualization, homage to you!

original: chu zla gzugs sa brnyan du ltung ba'i zla ba ni chu zla ste de bzhin gzung du med pa'o //
analyzed: chu zla gzugs sa brnyan du ltung ba'i zla ba ni chu zla ste de bzhin gzung du med pa'o //
translated: The moon in water is the moon in a reflection in water. It is not apprehended as it appears.

original: chu zla ni snang ba bzhin du yang gzung bar nus pa ma yin pa de bzhin du nam mkha'i khams kyi rang bzhin nyid yin pa'i phyir khyod @115b kyang gzung bar nus pa ma yin no //
analyzed: chu zla ni snang ba bzhin du yang gzung bar nus pa ma yin pa de bzhin du nam mkha'i khams kyi rang bzhin nyid yin pa'i phyir khyod @115b kyang gzung bar nus pa ma yin no //
translated: Just as the moon in water is not apprehended as it appears, so you are not apprehended because of being the nature of the element of space.

original: phung po la sogs pa'i chos rnams kun la so sor nges pa nyid du mi gnas shing thams cad la khyad par nyid du gnas pa yin te /
analyzed: phung po la sogs pa'i chos rnams kun la so sor nges pa nyid du mi gnas shing thams cad la khyad par nyid du gnas pa yin te /
translated: You do not abide in the individual determination of all phenomena such as the aggregates, and you abide in the distinction of all.

original: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because you are the essence of the gnosis of equality.

original: nyon mongs pa nga rgyal rnam par dag pas nga rgyal med pa'o //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa nga rgyal rnam par dag pas nga rgyal med pa'o //
translated: You are free of pride because of the purification of the affliction of pride.

original: nor gyis rgyags pa'i sgo nas khengs pa rnams kyis mi shes pa ni rmongs pa ste de spong ba'i phyir rmongs pa ni mnga' ba'o //
analyzed: nor gyis rgyags pa'i sgo nas khengs pa rnams kyis mi shes pa ni rmongs pa ste de spong ba'i phyir rmongs pa ni mnga' ba'o //
translated: The ignorant are those who are puffed up with the pride of wealth.

original: dngos po la mngon par zhen pa ni dmigs pa se /
analyzed: dngos po la mngon par zhen pa ni dmigs pa se /
translated: The object is the attachment to things.

original: de med pa nyid yin pa'i phyir //
analyzed: de med pa nyid yin pa'i phyir //
translated: Since that does not exist,

original: dmigs med khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: dmigs med khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to you, who are free of the object!

original: zhes bya ba ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyi sgo nas bstod pa yin te dgongs pa ma yin pa'o //🔽gshegs dang bzhugs dang de bzhin gzims //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyi sgo nas bstod pa yin te dgongs pa ma yin pa'o // gshegs dang bzhugs dang de bzhin gzims //
translated: This is the praise from the point of view of Ratnasaṃbhava, not from the point of view of the transcendent family.🔽You are always in meditative concentration🔽In all your activities,

original: spyod lam dag ni kun la yang //
analyzed: spyod lam dag ni kun la yang //
translated: Whether walking, standing, sitting, or lying down,

original: khyod ni rtag tu mnyam par gzhag / dmigs med khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: khyod ni rtag tu mnyam par gzhag / dmigs med khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to you, who are free of the object!

original: gshegs pa la sogs pa'i spyod lam bzhi po de rnams su bya ba nan tan sgrub pas sems can thams cad kyi don bya ba'i phyir mnyam par gzhag pa zhes bya ba ni gcig tu rnam par mi rtog pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'o //
analyzed: gshegs pa la sogs pa'i spyod lam bzhi po de rnams su bya ba nan tan sgrub pas sems can thams cad kyi don bya ba'i phyir mnyam par gzhag pa zhes bya ba ni gcig tu rnam par mi rtog pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'o //
translated: In all those four activities, such as walking, you are in meditative concentration, because you accomplish your aims by means of the duty of accomplishing the aims of all sentient beings. Meditative concentration means being of one nature with nonconceptual wisdom.

original: dmigs med ces bya ba ni sems can rnams kyi don bya ba la spro ba dang bsdu ba'i rnam par rtog pa med pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba ni don yod par grub pa'i sgo nas bstod pa yin te dgongs pa ma yin pa'o ;
analyzed: dmigs med ces bya ba ni sems can rnams kyi don bya ba la spro ba dang bsdu ba'i rnam par rtog pa med pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba ni don yod par grub pa'i sgo nas bstod pa yin te dgongs pa ma yin pa'o ;
translated: This is praise from the point of view of Amoghasiddhi.

original: / sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyis //
analyzed: / sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyis //
translated: Through the illusion-like meditative stabilization,

original: cho 'phrul chen po rnam 'phrul zhing //
analyzed: cho 'phrul chen po rnam 'phrul zhing //

original: tha dad med la snyoms 'jug pa //
analyzed: tha dad med la snyoms 'jug pa //
translated: and enter into meditative absorption without differentiation.

original: dmigs med khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: dmigs med khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to you who are free of objectification!

original: rdzu 'phrul chen po ste lus kyi 'phar ba dang snang ba la sogs pa rnams dang gsungs dbyangs yan lag drug cu dang ldan pa bstan pa rnams dang thugs kyi sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin te /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul chen po ste lus kyi 'phar ba dang snang ba la sogs pa rnams dang gsungs dbyangs yan lag drug cu dang ldan pa bstan pa rnams dang thugs kyi sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin te /
translated: The great miracles are the body's leaping and shining and so forth, the speech's display endowed with the sixty melodious qualities and the mind's illusion-like meditative stabilization.

original: chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes rdo rje lta bus rnam par 'khrul ba ni 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa spangs pa'i phyir 'bad pa byed pa'o //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes rdo rje lta bus rnam par 'khrul ba ni 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa spangs pa'i phyir 'bad pa byed pa'o //
translated: The vajra-like pristine awareness of the ultimate dimension of phenomena is the effort to eliminate the error of attachment and so forth, the afflictive emotions and the proximate emotions.

original: de nyid kyi phyir chos kyi dbyings shin tu rnam par dag pa'i ye shes ni chos thams cad kyi chos nyid kyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir tha dad min te dbye ba med pa nyid du snyoms par zhugs pa dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir chos kyi dbyings shin tu rnam par dag pa'i ye shes ni chos thams cad kyi chos nyid kyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir tha dad min te dbye ba med pa nyid du snyoms par zhugs pa dang ldan pa'o //
translated: Therefore, the pristine awareness of the ultimate dimension of phenomena, which is utterly pure, is not different, not differentiated, because it is the nature of the reality of all phenomena.

original: de nyid kyi phyir chu'i khams la dmigs pa'i rnam par rtog pa dag par byed pa nyid yin pas dmigs med do //🔽khyod la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba ni mi bskyod pa'i sgo nas @116a * //

translated: Therefore, it is without reference, because it is the purifier of the conceptual thoughts that refer to the water element.🔽Homage to you!

original: bstod pa ste dgongs pa ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: bstod pa ste dgongs pa ma yin pa'o //
translated: This is the praise from the point of view of Akshobhya, not the indirect one.

original: bstod pa byas nas gsol ba gdab pa ni //
analyzed: bstod pa byas nas gsol ba gdab pa ni //

analyzed: de ltar rdo rje slob dpon la bden par gyur pa'i yon tan gyi tshogs kyi sgo nas yang dag par bstod nas /
translated: Having thus praised the vajra master with a host of true qualities,

original: mnyan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa 'dis gsol ba gdab par bya'o zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: mnyan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa 'dis gsol ba gdab par bya'o zhes bya ba gsungs te /

analyzed: de ltar sngar tshigs su bcad pa lngas bden par gyur pa'i yon tan gyi tshogs kyi sgo ste / de bzhin gshegs pa lnga dang 'brel pa'i 'khrul pa med pa'i yon tan gyi tshogs pa sgrags  pa'i sgo nas bstod pa byas nas mnyam pa'i phyir zhes bya ba bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa'i man ngag mnyan par bya ba 'chad par 'gyur ba'i tshigs su
translated: Thus, with five verses, he praises with a host of true qualities,🔽a host of qualities of non-error related to the five tathagatas.🔽For the sake of hearing, he should supplicate with this one verse

original: bcad pa gcig pa 'dis gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
analyzed: bcad pa gcig pa 'dis gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
translated: that explains the intimate instruction of the stage of self-consecration.

original: de nyid ni /
analyzed: de nyid ni /
translated: That is to say,

original: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes tshogs //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes tshogs //
translated: the assembly of omniscient pristine consciousness

original: srid pa'i 'khor lo rnam sbyong ba //
analyzed: srid pa'i 'khor lo rnam sbyong ba //
translated: purifies the wheel of existence.

original: de ring bshad pa'i rin chen gyis //
analyzed: de ring bshad pa'i rin chen gyis //
translated: Today, with the precious explanation,

original: gtso bos bdag la bka' drin stsol //
analyzed: gtso bos bdag la bka' drin stsol //

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /

translated: The knowledge of the great Vajradhara, which is the knowledge that collects the five knowledges of the Omniscient One.

analyzed: de'i phyir tshogs ni rang gi rig par bya ba'i ye shes chen po'i rang bzhin no //

original: de nyid kyi phyir rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis kyi rang bzhin gyi srid pa'i 'khor lo nyon mongs pa dang las dang sdug bsngal rnams kyi nyin re zhing zo chun gyi 'khrul 'khor bzhin du 'khor ba rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis kyi rang bzhin gyi srid pa'i 'khor lo nyon mongs pa dang las dang sdug bsngal rnams kyi nyin re zhing zo chun gyi 'khrul 'khor bzhin du 'khor ba rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes
translated: For that very reason, the wheel of existence, which has the nature of the twelve links of dependent origination, and which revolves day after day like a waterwheel, with the afflictions, actions, and sufferings, is the conduct of the non-conceptual knowledge

analyzed: bdag nyid chen po rnam par grol //

analyzed: gang zhig rten nas dngos po rnams //

analyzed: yang dag ma yin log min par //

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //

analyzed: de lta bu'i bcom ldan 'das rdo rje slob dpon gyis de ring bshad pa'i rin chen te /

analyzed: khyod zhabs padma ste zhabs padma gnyis spangs nas skyabs gzhan ma mchis te /

analyzed: khyod kho na skyabs yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //

analyzed: sangs rgyas gtso ni mi bskyod pa'i rang bzhin no //

analyzed: snying rje slob ma la bskyed de //

analyzed: de nas bdag byin brlab pa bstan //

analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /

analyzed: kun rdzob bden pa mthong ba ste // de ni bla ma'i drin dag gis //
translated: It is the seeing of the conventional truth.🔽That is attained

analyzed: 'thob par 'gyur gyis gzhan du min //

translated: O son of noble family, in that which is attained by the stage of the pure mind, the meaning of clarity, there is no divine body.

original: sems can ni gcig dang du mas cha shas shin tu phra bar dpyad na med pa dang / don dam pa 'ba' zhig gi ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sems can ni gcig dang du mas cha shas shin tu phra bar dpyad na med pa dang / don dam pa 'ba' zhig gi ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because sentient beings are not found when analyzed into the finest particles, either as one or as many, and because they are the nature of the sole ultimate.

original: dag rnam par dben pa'i rdo rje bzlas ba la yang lha'i sku nye bar mi dmigs te /
analyzed: dag rnam par dben pa'i rdo rje bzlas ba la yang lha'i sku nye bar mi dmigs te /
translated: In the vajra repetition of the emptiness of the body, the form of the deity is not perceived,

analyzed: 'jug pa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gyis rlung la gzugs med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //

original: 'od gsal ba las langs te /
analyzed: 'od gsal ba las langs te /

original: sgyu ma'i dpe bcu gnyis kyi rim pas bskyed pa yod kyi rang bzhin can nyid ye shes kyi skur mthong nas phyi rol na gnas pa'i dngos po rnams la yang de kho na bzhin du blta bar bya'o zhes bya ba 'di ni bdag ni bdag byin gyis brlab
analyzed: sgyu ma'i dpe bcu gnyis kyi rim pas bskyed pa yod kyi rang bzhin can nyid ye shes kyi skur mthong nas phyi rol na gnas pa'i dngos po rnams la yang de kho na bzhin du blta bar bya'o zhes bya ba 'di ni bdag ni bdag byin gyis brlab
translated: Having seen the existence of the creation by the sequence of the twelve examples of illusion as the gnosis body, one should also view external entities in the same way.

original: pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: pa'i rim pa'o //
translated: This is the stage of self-consecration.

original: kun rdzob ste sku bsgom pa'i bdag nyid dang gzugs la sogs pa rnams dang / sems can dang snod kyi 'jig rten dang zhi ba la sogs pa rnams dang sngags dang phyag rgya la sogs pa'i bya ba'i tshogs thams cad kyi bden pa mthong ba ste sgyu ma dang smig rgyu dang /

translated: The truth of the entire collection of the rites of the creation of the body, the body of form, and so on, of the sentient beings and the world receptacle, of peace and so on, of the rites of mantra and seal, and so on, is the seeing of illusion, mirage,

original: gzugs brnyan dang chu zla dang dri za'i grong khyer dang / sgra brnyan dang ; 'ja' tshon la sogs pa sgyu ma'i dpe rnams dang mtshungs par mthong zhing ji lta bu bzhin du mthong ba de ni bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa yin no zhes brjod par bya'o //

translated: One should say that seeing things as similar to the examples of illusion, such as a reflection, a moon in water, a fairy city, an echo, a mirage, and so on, is the stage of self-consecration.

original: de yang bla ma'i zhal snga nas kyi sku drin kho nas thob par 'gyur gyis gzhan du ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ni gsang ba nyid yin par bstan pa yin te sbas pa'o //
analyzed: de yang bla ma'i zhal snga nas kyi sku drin kho nas thob par 'gyur gyis gzhan du ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ni gsang ba nyid yin par bstan pa yin te sbas pa'o //
translated: Moreover, one will obtain that only through the kindness of the guru's instruction, not otherwise. This is the secret, which is taught to be hidden.

original: de nyid blang bar bya ba nyid yin par /
analyzed: de nyid blang bar bya ba nyid yin par /

analyzed: gang gis rnyed par ma gyur pa //

analyzed: mdo sde rgyud dang rtog pa la //

analyzed: de yi ngal ba don med 'gyur //
translated: will be fruitless.

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Thus it is said.

translated: Having attained the stage of self-consecration,

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin gtso //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin gtso //
translated: the nature of all buddhas, the chief,

original: tshe 'di nyid la sangs rgyas kyi //🔽'thob par 'gyur ba the tshom med //
analyzed: tshe 'di nyid la sangs rgyas kyi // 'thob par 'gyur ba the tshom med //
translated: in this very lifetime,

original: ces bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: ces bya ba gsungs te /
translated: there is no doubt that one will attain buddhahood.

original: sngar bshad pa'i bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa thob nas /
analyzed: sngar bshad pa'i bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa thob nas /
translated: Having attained the stage of self-consecration explained previously,

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin gtso bo rdo rje 'chang du gyur te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin gtso bo rdo rje 'chang du gyur te /
translated: he becomes the chief Vajradhara, the nature of all the Tathagatas,

original: sgyu ma lta bu nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyi sku thob pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sgyu ma lta bu nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyi sku thob pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because he has attained the body which is the nature of all the Tathagatas by means of the illusion-like sameness.

original: de @117b ltar yang tshe 'di nyid du sangs rgyas nyid de /
analyzed: de @117b ltar yang tshe 'di nyid du sangs rgyas nyid de /
translated: In this very life, in this very body, he attains Buddhahood,🔽he attains Vajradharahood, he attains the state of a Tathagata, without a doubt.

original: rdo rje 'chang nyid thob par 'gyur zhing rnyed par 'gyur bar the tshom med ces bya ba ni 'dir the tshom yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang nyid thob par 'gyur zhing rnyed par 'gyur bar the tshom med ces bya ba ni 'dir the tshom yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Here there is no doubt.

original: 'dir bsam pa ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: 'dir bsam pa ni 'di yin te /
translated: The idea here is this:

original: bskyed pa'i rim pas gang gi tshe rnal 'byor ba lha'i rnam par sgom par byed pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: bskyed pa'i rim pas gang gi tshe rnal 'byor ba lha'i rnam par sgom par byed pa de'i tshe /
translated: When the yogi/ni meditates on the form of the deity by means of the creation stage,

original: sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin med pas ma dag pa'i sangs rgyas nyid yin te /
analyzed: sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin med pas ma dag pa'i sangs rgyas nyid yin te /
translated: at that time, because he/she does not have the illusion-like samadhi, it is impure Buddhahood.

original: de nyid kyi phyir de ni btags pa'i rnal 'byor dang sngags kyi sku zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir de ni btags pa'i rnal 'byor dang sngags kyi sku zhes bya'o //
translated: Therefore, it is called the imagined body of yoga and mantra.

original: 'dir ni sgyu ma lta bu nyid gtso bo yin pas btags pa nyid ma yin pa'i phyir lha'i rnam pa'i bsgom pa ni nges pa kho nar sangs rgyas nyid yin te /
analyzed: 'dir ni sgyu ma lta bu nyid gtso bo yin pas btags pa nyid ma yin pa'i phyir lha'i rnam pa'i bsgom pa ni nges pa kho nar sangs rgyas nyid yin te /
translated: Here, since the illusion-like is primary, the cultivation of the deity’s form is definitely buddhahood, because it is not imagined.

original: de'i phyir ye shes kyi sku zhes brjod par bya'o zhes bya ba ni sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir ye shes kyi sku zhes brjod par bya'o zhes bya ba ni sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
translated: Therefore, it should be called the body of intuition. This is the literal meaning explanation.🔽Now, the distinction of cause and effect:🔽The meditative concentration of self-consecration

original: da ni rgyu dang 'bras bu'i bye brag / bdag byin brlab pa'i ting 'dzin dang // de bzhin 'od gsal ba yi gnas //
analyzed: da ni rgyu dang 'bras bu'i bye brag / bdag byin brlab pa'i ting 'dzin dang // de bzhin 'od gsal ba yi gnas //
translated: and likewise the state of clear light,

original: bden pa gnyis su bstan pa ni //
analyzed: bden pa gnyis su bstan pa ni //
translated: are taught as the two truths,

original: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dbye ba'o //
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dbye ba'o //
translated: the distinction of cause and effect.

original: zhes bya ba gsungs pa'i dgongs pa ni 'di yin te ;
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs pa'i dgongs pa ni 'di yin te ;
translated: The intention of this statement is as follows:

original: bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i ting nge 'dzin te rim pa gsum pas sgyu ma'i sku 'dzin pa dang 'od gsal ba'i gnas te /
analyzed: bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i ting nge 'dzin te rim pa gsum pas sgyu ma'i sku 'dzin pa dang 'od gsal ba'i gnas te /
translated: The meditative concentration of self-consecration, the third stage, is the cause, and the state of clear light is the effect.

original: rim pa gnyis pas rang bzhin dang snang ba dag par bya ba'i phyir 'od gsal ba'i de kho na nyid rtogs pa'i mtshan nyid ni de'i bden pa gnyis te kun rdzob dang don dam pa gnyis kyi bdag nyid rgyu dang 'bras bu'i bye brag tu shes par bya'o
analyzed: rim pa gnyis pas rang bzhin dang snang ba dag par bya ba'i phyir 'od gsal ba'i de kho na nyid rtogs pa'i mtshan nyid ni de'i bden pa gnyis te kun rdzob dang don dam pa gnyis kyi bdag nyid rgyu dang 'bras bu'i bye brag tu shes par bya'o
translated: By the second stage, one should understand the reality of clear light, which has the characteristic of realizing the suchness of clear light, as having the nature of the two truths, the two being the conventional and the ultimate, and as having the distinction of cause and effect.

original: // 'od gsal ba ni rgyu yin te de las sku 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: // 'od gsal ba ni rgyu yin te de las sku 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Clear light is the cause, because the body arises from it.

original: bdag byin gyis brlab pa ni 'bras bu yin te de ni de las 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bdag byin gyis brlab pa ni 'bras bu yin te de ni de las 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Self-consecration is the effect, because it arises from that.

original: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i bye brag gzhan yang /
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i bye brag gzhan yang /
translated: There is another distinction between cause and effect.

original: bdag byin brlab pa'i rim gyis ni //
analyzed: bdag byin brlab pa'i rim gyis ni //
translated: By the stage of self-consecration,

original: 'od gsal ba ni thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: 'od gsal ba ni thob par 'gyur //
translated: one attains clear light.

original: de bas rdo rje slob dpon gyis //
analyzed: de bas rdo rje slob dpon gyis //
translated: Therefore, the vajra master

original: dang por bdag byin brlab pa bstan //
analyzed: dang por bdag byin brlab pa bstan //
translated: first teaches self-consecration.

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: This is stated.

original: de nas bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa'i sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la brten nas kun rdzob dag par bya ba'i phyir rim pa bzhi pas 'dod chags la sogs pa dag par byas pas mngon par byang chub pa'i mtshan nyid kyi 'od gsal ba 'thob🔽par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nas bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa'i sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la brten nas kun rdzob dag par bya ba'i phyir rim pa bzhi pas 'dod chags la sogs pa dag par byas pas mngon par byang chub pa'i mtshan nyid kyi 'od gsal ba 'thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: Then, on the basis of the illusion-like meditative concentration of the stage of self-consecration, in order to purify the conventional, by purifying passion, etc., with the fourth stage, one attains the clearlight having the character of manifest enlightenment.

original: de'i phyir bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa ni rgyu yin la /
analyzed: de'i phyir bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa ni rgyu yin la /
translated: Therefore, the stage of self-consecration is the cause,

original: 'od gsal ba ni 'bras bu yin no zhes bya ba ni dbye ba'o //🔽de bas na rdo rje slob dpon gyis dang por gang gis 'od gsal ba khong du chud par @118a * //
analyzed: 'od gsal ba ni 'bras bu yin no zhes bya ba ni dbye ba'o // de bas na rdo rje slob dpon gyis dang por gang gis 'od gsal ba khong du chud par @118a * //
translated: and the clearlight is the result. This is the analysis.🔽Thus, the vajra-master should first teach the stage of self-consecration, by which one will understand the clearlight.

original: 'gyur ba'i bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa bstan par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'gyur ba'i bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa bstan par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This is the meaning.

original: de lta na rim pa gnyis pa dang bzhi pa'i rigs gcig pa yin te /
analyzed: de lta na rim pa gnyis pa dang bzhi pa'i rigs gcig pa yin te /
translated: Thus, the second and fourth stages are of the same kind,

original: thabs kyi bye brag dang sa'i bye brag las de dag tha dad pa yin no //
analyzed: thabs kyi bye brag dang sa'i bye brag las de dag tha dad pa yin no //
translated: but they are different because of the difference in the means and the difference in the stages.

original: de'i phyir 'od gsal ba ni rgyu yang yin 'bras bu yang yin par gyur cing bdag byin gyis brlab pa yang rgyu yang yin 'bras bu yang yin par ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'od gsal ba ni rgyu yang yin 'bras bu yang yin par gyur cing bdag byin gyis brlab pa yang rgyu yang yin 'bras bu yang yin par ro //
translated: Therefore, clear light is both the cause and the result, and self-consecration is also both the cause and the result.

original: 'on kyang rim pa bzhi pa la ltos nas ni rim pa gsum pa rgyu yin zhing /
analyzed: 'on kyang rim pa bzhi pa la ltos nas ni rim pa gsum pa rgyu yin zhing /
translated: However, in terms of the fourth stage, the third stage is the cause,

original: rim pa gnyis pa la ltos nas ni gsum pa 'bras bu yin no //
analyzed: rim pa gnyis pa la ltos nas ni gsum pa 'bras bu yin no //
translated: and in terms of the second stage, the third stage is the result.

original: rim pa gsum pa la ltos nas ni gnyis pa rgyu yin zhing /
analyzed: rim pa gsum pa la ltos nas ni gnyis pa rgyu yin zhing /
translated: In terms of the third stage, the second stage is the cause,

original: rim pa gsum pa la ltos nas ni bzhi ba 'bras bu yin zhes bya ba ni spas pa'o //
analyzed: rim pa gsum pa la ltos nas ni bzhi ba 'bras bu yin zhes bya ba ni spas pa'o //
translated: and in terms of the third stage, the fourth stage is the result.🔽This is the detailed explanation.

original: da ni bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa'i rang gi ngo bo rgyu dang bcas pa /
analyzed: da ni bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa'i rang gi ngo bo rgyu dang bcas pa /
translated: Now, the nature of the stage of self-consecration, together with its cause, is stated:

original: 'gro kun rang dbang med pa ste //
analyzed: 'gro kun rang dbang med pa ste //
translated: All beings are without independent nature,

original: rang dbang du ni 'byung ma yin //
analyzed: rang dbang du ni 'byung ma yin //
translated: and do not arise independently.

original: de yi rgyu ni 'od gsal ba //
analyzed: de yi rgyu ni 'od gsal ba //
translated: Their cause is clear light,

original: 'od gsal thams cad stong pa'o //🔽zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: 'od gsal thams cad stong pa'o //🔽zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: and clear light is emptiness of everything.

original: 'gro ba 'di ni las dang nyon mongs pa'i bag chags kyis bcings pa nyid yin pa'i phyir rang dbang med pa ste gzhan gyi dbang yin zhing /
analyzed: 'gro ba 'di ni las dang nyon mongs pa'i bag chags kyis bcings pa nyid yin pa'i phyir rang dbang med pa ste gzhan gyi dbang yin zhing /
translated: This world is bound by the latent tendencies of karma and afflictions, and therefore it is not independent, but is dependent on something else.

original: bskyed pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor ba'i lha'i sku gang yin pa de yang rang dbang med pa yin te /
analyzed: bskyed pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor ba'i lha'i sku gang yin pa de yang rang dbang med pa yin te /
translated: The deity body of the yoga of the creation stage is also not independent.

original: zla ba dang rdo rje la sogs pa'i rim gyis bskyed pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zla ba dang rdo rje la sogs pa'i rim gyis bskyed pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because it is created by the stages of the moon, vajra, and so on.

original: de bas na rang dbang ste rang gi mthus 'byung ba ma yin zhing skye ba ma yin pa kho na'o //
analyzed: de bas na rang dbang ste rang gi mthus 'byung ba ma yin zhing skye ba ma yin pa kho na'o //
translated: Therefore, it is not independent, not arisen by its own power, and not arisen at all.
